analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ma yin pa las yin gyi rjes su dpag pa las byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: is not from non-inference, but from what arises from inference.

original: nyams su myong ba'i bag chags las byung ba'i dran pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i bag chags las byung ba'i dran pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not memory that arises from the latent tendencies of experience,

original: gzhan du nyams su myong ba la tha snyad med par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ni gang zhig ces bya ba'o //üîΩnyams su myong ba dran pa phyi rol la yin gyi rnam pa ni ma yin par bstan pa ni de lta bur zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan du nyams su myong ba la tha snyad med par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ni gang zhig ces bya ba'o // nyams su myong ba dran pa phyi rol la yin gyi rnam pa ni ma yin par bstan pa ni de lta bur zhes bya ba ste /
translated: because it would follow that there would be no convention regarding experience elsewhere.üîΩIt is taught that memory of experience is external, not the aspect.

original: mngon sum gyi snang ba ste de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i dran pa yin gyi phyi rol ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi snang ba ste de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i dran pa yin gyi phyi rol ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is the appearance of direct perception, the memory that follows it, not the external.

original: mngon sum pa phyi rol lo zhes bya ba yang mngon sum pa ma yin par bstan pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mngon sum pa phyi rol lo zhes bya ba yang mngon sum pa ma yin par bstan pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement ‚ÄúThe external is directly perceived‚Äù is not directly perceived.

original: mngon sum gyi snang ba ma rtogs pa gzhan ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi snang ba ma rtogs pa gzhan ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the appearance of direct perception is not something else.

original: snang ba ni snang bzhin pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: snang ba ni snang bzhin pa'i don du'o //
translated: ‚Äú Appearance‚Äù means an object that appears.

original: don ni phyi rol lo //
analyzed: don ni phyi rol lo //
translated: ‚Äú Object‚Äù means external.

original: de 'dra ba ni snang ba ci 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: de 'dra ba ni snang ba ci 'dra ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Like that‚Äù means like the appearance.

original: gcig pa nyid de tha mi dad pa yin na'o //
analyzed: gcig pa nyid de tha mi dad pa yin na'o //
translated: ‚Äú If it were the same‚Äù means if it were not different.

original: don ni snang bas so //
analyzed: don ni snang bas so //
translated: ‚Äú The object‚Äù means the appearance.

original: rags pa zhes bya ba ni don dang don ma yin pa'i thun mong ba yin te /
analyzed: rags pa zhes bya ba ni don dang don ma yin pa'i thun mong ba yin te /
translated: ‚Äú Coarse‚Äù means common to both objects and non-objects.

original: don ma yin pa yang phyi rol yin pa'i @173b phyir ro //
analyzed: don ma yin pa yang phyi rol yin pa'i @173b phyir ro //
translated: Because non-objects are also external.

original: de skad zer ba ni cha gnyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de skad zer ba ni cha gnyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú That is said‚Äù means ‚Äútwo parts.‚Äù

original: snang bzhin pa ni phyi rol lam don ma yin pas yang ma yin te /
analyzed: snang bzhin pa ni phyi rol lam don ma yin pas yang ma yin te /
translated: ‚Äú The appearance‚Äù is not external or non-object,

original: gzhan du de ltar nges pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni 'di ni phyis zhes bya ba de med na ni de mi 'byung zhes bya bas so //
analyzed: gzhan du de ltar nges pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni 'di ni phyis zhes bya ba de med na ni de mi 'byung zhes bya bas so //
translated: because it is ascertained as such elsewhere. This is shown by ‚ÄúIf that did not exist, this would not occur.‚Äù

original: rig pa kho na shes pa'i don gyi rnam pa nyid rtogs bya ma yin no //
analyzed: rig pa kho na shes pa'i don gyi rnam pa nyid rtogs bya ma yin no //
translated: The aspect of the object of consciousness itself is not to be realized.

original: so sor snang bas kyang ngo zhes bstan pa ni don dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: so sor snang bas kyang ngo zhes bstan pa ni don dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement by the appearance of each teaches that it is endowed with an object.

original: don dang 'dra ba'i rnam pa ni don gyi rnam pa'i shes pa'i yin la de ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: don dang 'dra ba'i rnam pa ni don gyi rnam pa'i shes pa'i yin la de ma yin pa'o //
translated: The aspect similar to the object is of the consciousness of the aspect of the object, not of that which is not.

original: de la dgos pa ni 'di kho na don nyid yin no zhes bya bar ro //
analyzed: de la dgos pa ni 'di kho na don nyid yin no zhes bya bar ro //
translated: The purpose is just this: It is the object itself.

original: nges pa ni de'i rnam pa can nyid kyi 'das pa la sogs par 'dzin pa la'o zhes bstan pa ni 'das pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges pa ni de'i rnam pa can nyid kyi 'das pa la sogs par 'dzin pa la'o zhes bstan pa ni 'das pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The ascertainment is in the apprehension of the past, etc., by the aspect of that. The statement of the past, etc., teaches this.

original: tshul gnyis zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i rnam pa nyid kyi gzhal bya dang / gzhan gyis mi 'grub pa'i rtogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: tshul gnyis zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i rnam pa nyid kyi gzhal bya dang / gzhan gyis mi 'grub pa'i rtogs pa nyid do //
translated: The two modes are the object with the aspect of blue and the realization that is not established by another.

original: 'dzin par byed pa rang rig par gyur pa ni 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pa rang rig par gyur pa ni 'bras bu'o //
translated: The apprehender is the result, which is reflexive awareness.

original: dgag par bya ba bstan pa ni gang dag shes pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dgag par bya ba bstan pa ni gang dag shes pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement Those who say that consciousness is . . . teaches the object of negation.

original: shes pa ni rtogs pa nyid yin na shes pa la nges pa yin te nges na bdag gir 'gyur ba ste byed ba shes pa po nyid kyi ngo bo ni lkog tu gyur pa yin no zhes zer ba ni myong ba ma yin la zhes bya ba ste
analyzed: shes pa ni rtogs pa nyid yin na shes pa la nges pa yin te nges na bdag gir 'gyur ba ste byed ba shes pa po nyid kyi ngo bo ni lkog tu gyur pa yin no zhes zer ba ni myong ba ma yin la zhes bya ba ste
translated: This is not experience.

original: mngon sum mo //
analyzed: mngon sum mo //
translated: This is direct perception.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de ni rnam pa ma yin te mngon sum dang cig shos dag de'i bdag nyid ma yin no zhes zer ba ni don gyi rnam pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de ni rnam pa ma yin te mngon sum dang cig shos dag de'i bdag nyid ma yin no zhes zer ba ni don gyi rnam pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is not a form, because direct perception and its opposite are not its nature. This is what is said by the phrase ‚Äúalso the form of the object.‚Äù

original: gsal ba zhes bya ba ni phyi rol nyid du nges pa rnam par 'dzin pa yin na'o //
analyzed: gsal ba zhes bya ba ni phyi rol nyid du nges pa rnam par 'dzin pa yin na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúClear‚Äù means the ascertainment of external reality.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the apprehender.

original: thams cad la ni rab rib las byung ba la sogs pa la yang do //
analyzed: thams cad la ni rab rib las byung ba la sogs pa la yang do //
translated: ‚ÄúAll‚Äù refers to those with cataracts and so on.

original: don lta bu'i rnam par shes pa gang gi yin pa de'i ngo bo zhes bya bas rig par bya ba bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: don lta bu'i rnam par shes pa gang gi yin pa de'i ngo bo zhes bya bas rig par bya ba bstan pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThe nature of that consciousness that has the form of the object‚Äù teaches the object of knowledge.

original: de la bstan pa ni gang la don yod pa zhes bya bas tshigs su bcad pa bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de la bstan pa ni gang la don yod pa zhes bya bas tshigs su bcad pa bshad pa yin no //
translated: The teaching is that which is explained by the verse beginning with where there is an object.

original: mngon sum gyis gnod pa zhes bya ba ni nye ba'i snang ba ni 'das pa'o don dang 'gal ba can yin pa'o //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis gnod pa zhes bya ba ni nye ba'i snang ba ni 'das pa'o don dang 'gal ba can yin pa'o //
translated: The contradiction with perception is the contradiction with the object of the proximate appearance.

original: 'brel pa 'dzin pa nye ba'i mngon sum gyi snang ba lkog tu gyur ba ma yin pa phyi rol las gzhan pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa 'dzin pa nye ba'i mngon sum gyi snang ba lkog tu gyur ba ma yin pa phyi rol las gzhan pa'o //
translated: The grasping of the relation is the non-hidden appearance of the proximate perception, which is different from the external.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa 'dzin pa las so //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa 'dzin pa las so //
translated: From that, means from the grasping of the relation.

original: de zhes bya ba ni shes pa yin na'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni shes pa yin na'o //
translated: That, means the cognition.

original: thams cad du ni don bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: thams cad du ni don bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa la yang ngo //
translated: Everywhere, means in the desire for the object.

original: yul shes pa la rang bzhin ni tshul gnyis nyid do //üîΩde'i ste yul shes pa'i shes pa yin la de'i de yang tshul @174a * //
analyzed: yul shes pa la rang bzhin ni tshul gnyis nyid do // de'i ste yul shes pa'i shes pa yin la de'i de yang tshul @174a * //
translated: The nature of the cognition of the object is the twofold mode.

original: gnyis yin no //
analyzed: gnyis yin no //
translated: That, means the cognition of the object, and that also has the twofold mode.

original: de kho na bzhin du thams cad la'o //
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du thams cad la'o //
translated: Just so, means everywhere.

original: tshul gnyis nyid 'dzin pa can gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir des ma nges pa ma yin te phyi rol gyi yul nyid mngon par 'dod pa tsam las yin pa'i phyir dang / mi slu bas kyang tshad ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshul gnyis nyid 'dzin pa can gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir des ma nges pa ma yin te phyi rol gyi yul nyid mngon par 'dod pa tsam las yin pa'i phyir dang / mi slu bas kyang tshad ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it has the nature of holding both modes, it is not uncertain. This is because it is merely the assertion of external objects, and because it is valid knowledge because it is non-deceptive.

original: de'i phyir / ma lus sgrub par byed blo yang //
analyzed: de'i phyir / ma lus sgrub par byed blo yang //
translated: Therefore, the cognition that establishes all is

original: gal te brdzun 'dod de yi phyir //üîΩji ltar 'dod pa kun med pa'am //
analyzed: gal te brdzun 'dod de yi phyir // ji ltar 'dod pa kun med pa'am //
translated: if it is asserted to be false,üîΩthen it follows that all as desired

original: ma tshang sogs par thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: ma tshang sogs par thal bar 'gyur //
translated: is non-existent, incomplete, and so forth.

original: de rnams dmigs bcas nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: de rnams dmigs bcas nyid du 'gyur //
translated: Those would be with observation.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs par legs par smras pa ma yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs par legs par smras pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, it is not well-said.

original: de 'dzin pa la 'das pa nyid snang ba ma yin te ngo bo rig pa ma yin na /
analyzed: de 'dzin pa la 'das pa nyid snang ba ma yin te ngo bo rig pa ma yin na /
translated: The past itself does not appear to the apprehension of that, because the essence is not cognized.

original: ngo bo rig na yang 'das pa nyid ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ngo bo rig na yang 'das pa nyid ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If the essence were cognized, it would not be past. This is the meaning.

original: de'i phyir 'di'i ngo bo nyid spyir gzung ba nyid du snang ba yin par bstan pa ni sngo sogs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di'i ngo bo nyid spyir gzung ba nyid du snang ba yin par bstan pa ni sngo sogs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is taught that the essence of that is generally apprehended as appearance. The words blue, etc. are used.

original: rigs ni kha dog dang ldan pa ma yin la /
analyzed: rigs ni kha dog dang ldan pa ma yin la /
translated: The reason is not the same as the color.

original: bsgos na yang shel lta bur tha dad par grub na'o //
analyzed: bsgos na yang shel lta bur tha dad par grub na'o //
translated: If it were, then when the reason is modified, the color would be established as different, like a crystal.

original: de yang rang gi rig par bya ba shes pa'i ngo bo phyi rol du mngon par 'dod pa'i byed pa'i yul ni rang gi rig pa la gsal ba yin zhing phyi rol la ni mi gsal ba yin no //üîΩde ltar dbye ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang rang gi rig par bya ba shes pa'i ngo bo phyi rol du mngon par 'dod pa'i byed pa'i yul ni rang gi rig pa la gsal ba yin zhing phyi rol la ni mi gsal ba yin no // de ltar dbye ba yang ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, the object of the activity that is the nature of the cognition of self-awareness, which is asserted to be external, is clear in self-awareness but unclear in the external.

original: de'i mngon par 'dod pa nyid dang rang nyid rig pa la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir mi rtag pa ni res 'ga' ba'i snang ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i mngon par 'dod pa nyid dang rang nyid rig pa la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir mi rtag pa ni res 'ga' ba'i snang ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not like that, because the distinction is not different from the assertion itself and self-awareness. Impermanence is the appearance of something that sometimes exists.

original: skyed par byed pa ni snang ba yin la snang bzhin pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: skyed par byed pa ni snang ba yin la snang bzhin pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The producer is the appearance, not the appearing,

original: yul dang dus la sogs pa ma chad pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yul dang dus la sogs pa ma chad pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because the object, time, etc. are not established without interruption. This is the meaning.

original: rgyu nyid kyi phyir ni snang bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu nyid kyi phyir ni snang bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of being the cause, it is because of appearing.

original: skyed par byed pa ma yin pa ni snang bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: skyed par byed pa ma yin pa ni snang bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa ste /
translated: What is not a producer does not appear.

original: khyab pa can gyi snang ba mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab pa can gyi snang ba mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not logical that a pervasive appearance would exist.

original: rang gi rig pa zhen pa dang brjod pa dag la mngon par 'dod pa'i yul nyid la sogs pa'i don yang de ma rtogs pa'am cig shos med par bstan pa ni ming sogs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi rig pa zhen pa dang brjod pa dag la mngon par 'dod pa'i yul nyid la sogs pa'i don yang de ma rtogs pa'am cig shos med par bstan pa ni ming sogs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning of the statement ‚ÄúThe object of desire and expression is not known to exist apart from self-awareness‚Äù is that it is not known to exist apart from self-awareness or apart from the other.

original: zhen par bya ba ni rang gi rig pa las tha dad pa'i shes bya ma yin zhing zhen pa las tha dad pa dang cig shos dang bral ba dngos po med pa'i zhen par bya ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: zhen par bya ba ni rang gi rig pa las tha dad pa'i shes bya ma yin zhing zhen pa las tha dad pa dang cig shos dang bral ba dngos po med pa'i zhen par bya ba yang ma yin te /
translated: The object of desire is not a knowable object that is different from self-awareness. It is not an object of desire that is different from the desire and is devoid of the other. It is not a non-entity.

original: rang gi rnam pa phyi rol du sgro btags pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i shes bya yin te /
analyzed: rang gi rnam pa phyi rol du sgro btags pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i shes bya yin te /
translated: The superimposition of an external form is a conceptual knowable object.

original: de ltar 'phangs pa ni de'i byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar 'phangs pa ni de'i byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is projected in that way, it is the activity of that.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags las byung ba yang don @174b med pa nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags las byung ba yang don @174b med pa nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir /
translated: It is also illogical that it arises from the latent propensities of conceptuality and is meaningless.

original: ma rig pa las de lta bu'i byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: ma rig pa las de lta bu'i byed pa yin gyi /
translated: It is the activity of ignorance.

original: de lta bu'i gzung ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i gzung ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the apprehended object in that way.

original: rnam pa med pa rig pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang rgyu ma yin pa yul ma yin pa'i phyir dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa nyid kyis kyang ngo med pa nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni tshul 'di zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rnam pa med pa rig pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang rgyu ma yin pa yul ma yin pa'i phyir dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa nyid kyis kyang ngo med pa nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni tshul 'di zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is the method.

original: rnam par rtog pa la yod pa'i rigs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa la yod pa'i rigs pa'o //
translated: This is the reasoning that exists for conceptual thought.üîΩFrom what?

original: ci las she na 'dod pa tsam zhes bya ba ste /üîΩma rig pa las byung ba skyed byed ma yin pa gzung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ci las she na 'dod pa tsam zhes bya ba ste / ma rig pa las byung ba skyed byed ma yin pa gzung ba ma yin te /
translated: From mere desire.üîΩThat which arises from ignorance is not a producer, not a percept.

original: dmigs pa'i shes pa skyed par mi byed pa mi rigs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i shes pa skyed par mi byed pa mi rigs pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is not tenable that it does not generate a perceiving consciousness,

original: 'dod pa tsam las byung ba ni dmigs pa dang 'gal ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dod pa tsam las byung ba ni dmigs pa dang 'gal ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because that which arises from mere desire is not contradictory to a focal object.

original: rnam pa nyams su myong ba dag de'i bdag nyid nyams su myong ba las tshul gnyis nyid 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rnam pa nyams su myong ba dag de'i bdag nyid nyams su myong ba las tshul gnyis nyid 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi /
translated: The two modes are not only experienced as the essence of that which is experienced as aspects.

original: dran pa las kyang rjes su dpag pa las byung ba yin par bstan pa ni rnam pa 'di 'dra zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dran pa las kyang rjes su dpag pa las byung ba yin par bstan pa ni rnam pa 'di 'dra zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The author indicates that memory is derived from inference, not from perception, by the phrase ‚Äúhaving such a form.‚Äù

original: rnam pa 'di 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni 'das pa 'dzin pa'o ;
analyzed: rnam pa 'di 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni 'das pa 'dzin pa'o ;
translated: ‚Äú Having such a form‚Äù means that it apprehends the past.

original: / myong las zhes bya ba ni de'i yul nyid do //
analyzed: / myong las zhes bya ba ni de'i yul nyid do //
translated: ‚Äú From experience‚Äù means that it has that as its object.

original: stong na zhes bya ba ni de'i yul du tha snyad 'dogs pas so //üîΩshes la nges rtog med na min //
analyzed: stong na zhes bya ba ni de'i yul du tha snyad 'dogs pas so // shes la nges rtog med na min //
translated: ‚Äú If it is empty‚Äù means that it is designated as having that as its object.

original: zhes bstan pa ni de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i yul yang ma yin na khyad par ma yin la /
analyzed: zhes bstan pa ni de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i yul yang ma yin na khyad par ma yin la /
translated: ‚Äú If it is not ascertained in consciousness‚Äù means that it is not the object of that, and it is not a particular.

original: nyams su myong ba dang rnam pa dag 'dres pas tha mi dad par snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba dang rnam pa dag 'dres pas tha mi dad par snang ba ma yin te /
translated: ‚Äú It is not the appearance of the nondifferent mixing of experience and form‚Äù means that it is not the appearance of the nondifferent mixing of experience and form.

original: dran pa'i rnam par mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dran pa'i rnam par mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is seen in the aspect of memory.

original: snang bzhin pa 'di phyi rol ma yin na pa ni bden te /
analyzed: snang bzhin pa 'di phyi rol ma yin na pa ni bden te /
translated: ‚Äú It is true that this appearance is not external‚Äù means that it is true that it is not external.

original: de ni 'das pa yin la des sgro btags pa'i ngo bo yang dran pa'i dngos su ba yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: de ni 'das pa yin la des sgro btags pa'i ngo bo yang dran pa'i dngos su ba yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: ‚Äú It is past, and the nature superimposed by it is the object of memory‚Äù means that it is the object of memory.

original: 'on te de'i rnam pa can gyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te de'i rnam pa can gyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Or, ‚Äúhaving the aspect of that‚Äù?

original: de zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir ro//
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir ro//
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù means ‚Äúfor that reason.‚Äù

original: de tshe zhes bya ba brten pa'i rnam pa'i dus su'o //
analyzed: de tshe zhes bya ba brten pa'i rnam pa'i dus su'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAt that time‚Äù means at the time of the basis, the aspect.

original: med phyi ni 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med phyi ni 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúIt does not exist‚Äù because it has already passed.

original: de ltar yin na myong la'ang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dran pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: de ltar yin na myong la'ang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dran pa lta bu'o //
translated: If that is so, then it would be like experience, like memory.

original: der zhes bya ba ni rnam par te rnam pa med pa nyid mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: der zhes bya ba ni rnam par te rnam pa med pa nyid mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúThere‚Äù means in the aspect. It is unreasonable that there is no aspect.

original: 'das pa las ni mi gsal ba'i rnam pa yin la /
analyzed: 'das pa las ni mi gsal ba'i rnam pa yin la /
translated: From the past, the aspect is unclear.

original: gsal ba ni don nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: gsal ba ni don nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is clarity not the meaning itself?üîΩIt is said that there is no conceptualization in experience.

original: nyams su myong ba la ni rnam par rtog pa ma yin no zhes zer ba la rnam pa de ni zhes bya ba smos te 'di ni don gyi bskyed bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba la ni rnam par rtog pa ma yin no zhes zer ba la rnam pa de ni zhes bya ba smos te 'di ni don gyi bskyed bya ba ma yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúThat aspect‚Äù is mentioned. This is not produced by the meaning,

original: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i phyir la gsal ba don byed par nus pa ni nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid rjes su mthun par byed pa zhes bya @175a * //
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i phyir la gsal ba don byed par nus pa ni nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid rjes su mthun par byed pa zhes bya @175a * //
translated: because the characteristics are incompatible. And clarity is able to perform a function. It is said to be consistent with the nature of experience.

original: ba 'di nyid rigs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩdes na dran pa la snang ba can gyi don gyi ma yin no zhes dam bcas gzhan nyid yin pa'i phyir don gyi bskyed bya rnam pa de ma yin du zin kyang /
analyzed: ba 'di nyid rigs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // des na dran pa la snang ba can gyi don gyi ma yin no zhes dam bcas gzhan nyid yin pa'i phyir don gyi bskyed bya rnam pa de ma yin du zin kyang /
translated: This is the meaning of the statement, ‚ÄúIt is reasonable to say that the object is the cause of the cognition.‚ÄùüîΩTherefore, the object is not the cause of the appearance of the object in memory, because the object is different from the memory.

original: bag chags kyi bskyed bya shes pa la tha dad pa ni zhen par bya ba nyid kyis phyi rol yin la /
analyzed: bag chags kyi bskyed bya shes pa la tha dad pa ni zhen par bya ba nyid kyis phyi rol yin la /
translated: Even though the object is not the cause of the form of the cognition, the object is the cause of the cognition through its latent impressions.üîΩThe object is external because it is the object of attachment.üîΩThe cognition is real because it performs the function of the object.

original: shes pa don gyi bya ba byed pa nyid kyis dngos po yin no snyam du sems pa la rnam pa de ni zhes bya ba smos so /
analyzed: shes pa don gyi bya ba byed pa nyid kyis dngos po yin no snyam du sems pa la rnam pa de ni zhes bya ba smos so /
translated: The word ‚Äúthat‚Äù refers to the form of the cognition.

original: thun mong ma yin pa'i shes pa las gzhan pa ni gzhan pa'o //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa'i shes pa las gzhan pa ni gzhan pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOther‚Äù means other than the uncommon cognition.

original: bdag la 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi bag chags kyi bskyed bya yin pa'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa nyid ni thun mong ba ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: bdag la 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi bag chags kyi bskyed bya yin pa'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa nyid ni thun mong ba ma yin pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúRelated to the self‚Äù means that it is not common because it is the cause of the latent impressions of the self.üîΩ‚ÄúLike smoke‚Äù means that it is not common.

original: du ba lta bu yin la de lta yin dang zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: du ba lta bu yin la de lta yin dang zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that case‚Äù means because it is not common.

original: de lta ma yin na yang zhes bya ba ni ma bstan par te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na yang zhes bya ba ni ma bstan par te /
translated: Otherwise, means if it were not so, i.e., if it were not taught.

original: de lta na yang thun mong ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta na yang thun mong ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Even so, it is common to all.

original: gzhan nyid do zhes bya ba ni ston pa po dang 'brel pa dang 'dra ba yin gyi phyi rol gyi ngo bo dang ldan pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan nyid do zhes bya ba ni ston pa po dang 'brel pa dang 'dra ba yin gyi phyi rol gyi ngo bo dang ldan pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is different, means it is related to the teacher, but it does not have an external nature.

original: re re dag dang zhes bya ba ni skyes bu re re zhing tha dad pa'i phyi rol gyis so //
analyzed: re re dag dang zhes bya ba ni skyes bu re re zhing tha dad pa'i phyi rol gyis so //
translated: Each one, means each person has a different external nature.

original: de'i bdag nyid la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid bzhin du thun mong ma yin pa'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid bzhin du thun mong ma yin pa'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Its nature, etc. means that it is not common, like its nature.

original: mtshams sbyor ba ni log par rtogs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: mtshams sbyor ba ni log par rtogs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The connection is not a wrong idea.

original: der snang min ni tha dad pa ma yin par snang ba dag gi'o //
analyzed: der snang min ni tha dad pa ma yin par snang ba dag gi'o //
translated: Not appearing there, means not appearing as different.

original: tha mi dad pa'i blo ni 'dra ba nyid dmigs pa ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa'i blo ni 'dra ba nyid dmigs pa ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: The nondifferent cognition does not apprehend the similarity. What then?

original: de nyid la phyi rol de ni med pa yin la de'i rnam pa'i blo'i rnam pa dang ldan pa ni tha dad pa yin na yang gzhan yang rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes snga ma bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ba bstan pa ni de tshe zhes bya ba ste
analyzed: de nyid la phyi rol de ni med pa yin la de'i rnam pa'i blo'i rnam pa dang ldan pa ni tha dad pa yin na yang gzhan yang rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes snga ma bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ba bstan pa ni de tshe zhes bya ba ste
translated: And if that external object does not exist, and the aspect of the cognition that has the aspect of that does exist, then even though they are different, it would be understood as other, as before.üîΩThe consequence of this is shown:

original: / tha dad pa la tha mi dad par snang ba khas blangs pa'i dus na'o //
analyzed: / tha dad pa la tha mi dad par snang ba khas blangs pa'i dus na'o //
translated: If you accept that what is different appears as non-different,

original: 'o na te 'dra ba nyid ces bya ba ni de nyid kyi shes pa'i yul la re re zhing khas blangs pa yin na ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'o na te 'dra ba nyid ces bya ba ni de nyid kyi shes pa'i yul la re re zhing khas blangs pa yin na ni ma yin no //
translated: If you accept that the object of that cognition is similar to each of them, it is not so.

original: tha dad par snang ba yang thun mong ba nyid kyi phyir de'i shes pa de yin par bstan pa ni de lta na 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha dad par snang ba yang thun mong ba nyid kyi phyir de'i shes pa de yin par bstan pa ni de lta na 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: And if the appearance as different is common to both, then the cognition of that is shown:

original: gang gi tshe ni gang gi dus su yang ngo //
analyzed: gang gi tshe ni gang gi dus su yang ngo //
translated: If that is so, then at no time

original: bden pa la yang tha mi dad pa la tha dad pa'i blo'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir blo thun mong ba nyid dam thun mong ma yin pa nyid la yang shes pa'i rnam pa grub po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bden pa la yang tha mi dad pa la tha dad pa'i blo'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir blo thun mong ba nyid dam thun mong ma yin pa nyid la yang shes pa'i rnam pa grub po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: And because the aspect of the cognition is different from the object, even though it is not different from it, therefore, the object is established as having a common or uncommon aspect.

original: don dang ldan pa'i nyams su myong ba'i sems @175b la don med pa'i rnam par dogs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: don dang ldan pa'i nyams su myong ba'i sems @175b la don med pa'i rnam par dogs pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it that the mind which has an experience of an object is not suspected of having an unreal aspect?üîΩHow does it eliminate?

original: ji ltar sel bar byed ces zer ba la gal te na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar sel bar byed ces zer ba la gal te na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If it is said that it is by means of a mental process,

original: yong su brtags pas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yong su brtags pas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: by means of an investigation,

original: sngo sogs tha dad can snang phyir //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pas sam /
analyzed: sngo sogs tha dad can snang phyir // zhes bya ba la sogs pas sam /
translated: because blue, etc., appear as different,

original: gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma'i stobs kyis te /üîΩrnam pa de ni don gyi min //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma'i stobs kyis te / rnam pa de ni don gyi min //
translated: or by means of a valid cognition that contradicts,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa las so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa las so //
translated: as in the case of the statement, ‚ÄúThat aspect is not of the object.‚Äù

original: nyams su myong ba ni rnam pa dang bcas pa yin te /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba ni rnam pa dang bcas pa yin te /
translated: An experience is with an aspect,

original: de 'dzin pa la de dang ldan pa nyid du snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de 'dzin pa la de dang ldan pa nyid du snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it appears as if it has that which apprehends it.

original: de'i shes pa 'dzin pa can ni de dang tha dad pa'i yul la 'dzin pa can ma yin na yul du tha snyad 'dogs pa gang gis de 'dzin pa can du 'gyur zhes bstan pa ni de yang ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i shes pa 'dzin pa can ni de dang tha dad pa'i yul la 'dzin pa can ma yin na yul du tha snyad 'dogs pa gang gis de 'dzin pa can du 'gyur zhes bstan pa ni de yang ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If its consciousness were not that which apprehends an object that is different from it, by what would it be apprehended as that which apprehends?

original: cha gnyis zhes bya ba ni yul dang nyams su myong ba dag go //
analyzed: cha gnyis zhes bya ba ni yul dang nyams su myong ba dag go //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin two parts‚Äù refers to the object and the experience.

original: rnam pa gcig gis zhes bya ba ni rang gi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gcig gis zhes bya ba ni rang gi rnam pa'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin one aspect‚Äù refers to its own aspect.

original: de shes pa yis zhes bya ba ni yongs su brtags pa sta sngon po'i bdag nyid nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa'i shes pa de ltar dus phyis yongs su brtags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de shes pa yis zhes bya ba ni yongs su brtags pa sta sngon po'i bdag nyid nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa'i shes pa de ltar dus phyis yongs su brtags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúby that consciousness‚Äù means that it is imagined by the consciousness that experiences the aspect of the form that has the nature of blue. The meaning of the phrase ‚Äúat a later time‚Äù is that it is imagined after the fact.

original: yul gyi rnam pa nyid bzhin du 'dzin pa nyid kyang skye ba'i dus na gnyis kyi rnam pa nyid du nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa nyid bzhin du 'dzin pa nyid kyang skye ba'i dus na gnyis kyi rnam pa nyid du nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt the apprehension itself experienced in the same way as the aspect of the object at the time it arises, that is, as having two parts?

original: dran pa nye bar dgod pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar dgod pas ci zhig bya /
translated: What purpose is served by positing memory?

original: nyams su myong ba ma yin pa yang 'di dran pa ma yin zhing de shes pa de'i 'dzin pa nyid kho na yin no //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba ma yin pa yang 'di dran pa ma yin zhing de shes pa de'i 'dzin pa nyid kho na yin no //
translated: And the memory is not of the experience, but of the apprehension of the cognition.

original: dran pa'i rjes kyi dus la zhes //
analyzed: dran pa'i rjes kyi dus la zhes //
translated: ‚ÄúAt the time of the memory‚Äù

original: 'di ni brdzun pa nyid du grags //
analyzed: 'di ni brdzun pa nyid du grags //
translated: is known as the false.

original: de nyid tshe na 'di rig pa //
analyzed: de nyid tshe na 'di rig pa //
translated: At that time, there is the awareness

original: don gyi go ba skye ba yin //
analyzed: don gyi go ba skye ba yin //
translated: of the object that is understood.

original: don shes pa nyid las gzhan du mi 'thad pas de'i shes pa rtogs so zhes zer ba la de lta bur gyur pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don shes pa nyid las gzhan du mi 'thad pas de'i shes pa rtogs so zhes zer ba la de lta bur gyur pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Since it is not tenable that the memory is different from the cognition of the object, it is said that the memory is the apprehension of the cognition.

original: nyams su myong bzhin pa'i sngon po ni gzhan gyis sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'dzin pa dang rig pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i 'bras bu yang yin te /
analyzed: nyams su myong bzhin pa'i sngon po ni gzhan gyis sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'dzin pa dang rig pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i 'bras bu yang yin te /
translated: The experience of blue is not established by another, because it is the nature of apprehension and awareness. It is also the effect that has the same nature as the cognition.

original: sngon po gzung ba'o zhes bya bas de ma yin pa las log pas tha mi dad par ma rtogs pa log par rtog pa rnams rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: sngon po gzung ba'o zhes bya bas de ma yin pa las log pas tha mi dad par ma rtogs pa log par rtog pa rnams rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The statement ‚ÄúI apprehended blue‚Äù is the understanding of those who have a false understanding, because it is not a different understanding from the apprehension of blue.

original: phyis kyi dus su dran pa las /
analyzed: phyis kyi dus su dran pa las /
translated: ‚ÄúAt the time of the memory‚Äù

original: 'di ni nges pa med ma yin //
analyzed: 'di ni nges pa med ma yin //
translated: This is not indeterminate.

original: zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: This is the intention.

original: 'ba' zhig ni don gyi rnam pa dang bral ba rgyal dpog pa gang gi yin pa de'i yang blo ngo bo rnam pa med pa ni blo gzhan las tha dad par nges par rtogs par byed pa ma yin par bstan pa ni don gyis go ba zhes byaüîΩba'o // nges pa gzung bya min pa ni rnam pa @176a * //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig ni don gyi rnam pa dang bral ba rgyal dpog pa gang gi yin pa de'i yang blo ngo bo rnam pa med pa ni blo gzhan las tha dad par nges par rtogs par byed pa ma yin par bstan pa ni don gyis go ba zhes bya ba'o // nges pa gzung bya min pa ni rnam pa @176a * //
translated: Only is free from the aspect of the object. The cognition of the one who has it is essentially without aspect. It is taught that it does not cause ascertainment as distinct from another cognition. This is called understood by implication.

original: med pa rtog pa tsam yin pa'i phyir shes pa'i khyad par las blo rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: med pa rtog pa tsam yin pa'i phyir shes pa'i khyad par las blo rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The unapprehended is a mere conception without an aspect. The cognition is understood from the distinction of consciousness.

original: tha dad par 'gyur ba ma yin pa ni dngos po'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad par 'gyur ba ma yin pa ni dngos po'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not distinct, because it is the nature of the entity.üîΩBy that is gha√±.

original: des zhes bya ba ni gha nya zhes bya bas so //üîΩde ni zhes bya ba ni kti na'o //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ni gha nya zhes bya bas so // de ni zhes bya ba ni kti na'o //
translated: That is ktin.

original: de lta yin na'o //
analyzed: de lta yin na'o //
translated: It is like that.

original: nges par brtag par bya ba ci zhig yin zhes zer ba la de'i phyir sngon po la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges par brtag par bya ba ci zhig yin zhes zer ba la de'i phyir sngon po la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: What is to be ascertained? Therefore, blue, etc.

original: chos kyi bye brag gis ni ldog pas byas pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi bye brag gis ni ldog pas byas pa'o //
translated: The distinction of the object is made by the exclusion.

original: de'i rnam pa nyid ni rtogs pa'i ngo bo'i sngon po nyid do //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa nyid ni rtogs pa'i ngo bo'i sngon po nyid do //
translated: The form of that is the form of the cognition, i.e., the blue itself.

original: sngon po'i shes pa'o zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad par nyams su myong ba dang 'gal bar bstan pa ni sngon po las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngon po'i shes pa'o zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad par nyams su myong ba dang 'gal bar bstan pa ni sngon po las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The cognition of blue is the experience of the non-difference. The exclusion from blue is taught.

original: ngo bo gcig nyid yin na ji ltar 'dod pa'i blo nyid med pa yin gyi mngon sum gyi don ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni gal te zhes bya ba dang 'o na ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ngo bo gcig nyid yin na ji ltar 'dod pa'i blo nyid med pa yin gyi mngon sum gyi don ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni gal te zhes bya ba dang 'o na ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If there is only one nature, how can there be the absence of the desired cognition, but not the absence of the object of perception? This is thought. If, then, how?

original: ci la brten nas gang gi sel ba yin zhes zer ba la tshad mas grub gyur zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci la brten nas gang gi sel ba yin zhes zer ba la tshad mas grub gyur zhes bya ba'o //
translated: On what basis is there the exclusion of what? By the valid cognition, it is said.

original: don nam blo yang rung tshad mas grub po zhes bya ba'i brtag pa gnyis yin par bstan pa ni gal te don zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don nam blo yang rung tshad mas grub po zhes bya ba'i brtag pa gnyis yin par bstan pa ni gal te don zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The two hypotheses are taught: If the object, or the cognition, is established by the valid cognition.

original: don gyi phyogs la gnyis nyid yin par bstan pa ni de la re zhig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: don gyi phyogs la gnyis nyid yin par bstan pa ni de la re zhig ces bya ba'o //
translated: The duality is taught in the case of the object: There, first of all, etc.

original: blo ni don rtogs pa nyid kyi shes bya ma yin par bstan pa ni de blo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: blo ni don rtogs pa nyid kyi shes bya ma yin par bstan pa ni de blo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The cognition is not the object of the cognition of the object, as has been stated.

original: phyi rol la yang nyams su myong ba'i nyams su myong ba nyid de nyams su myong ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: phyi rol la yang nyams su myong ba'i nyams su myong ba nyid de nyams su myong ba ma yin nam /
translated: But is not the experience of the external object also the experience of the object?

original: gzhan du na nyams su myong ba ma yin par zer ba ni 'on te don yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du na nyams su myong ba ma yin par zer ba ni 'on te don yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it were not, then the statement that it is not the experience of the object would be meaningless.

original: nyams su myong ba'i nyams su myong ba dang / don nyams su myong ba gcig yin par bstan pa ni de lta na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i nyams su myong ba dang / don nyams su myong ba gcig yin par bstan pa ni de lta na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The experience of the object is the same as the experience of the experience, as has been stated.

original: de'i rnam pa can ni don la nyams su myong ba nges par byed do zhe na /üîΩdon ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa can ni don la nyams su myong ba nges par byed do zhe na / don ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is argued that the cognition of the object is ascertained by the form of the experience,üîΩthen the object is not the experience of the object.

original: nges pa'i rnam pa ni rnam pa'i sgo nas don la nyams su myong ba nges par byed pas nyams su myong ba nyid nges par byed pa ma yin par bstan pa ni dkar po las ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges pa'i rnam pa ni rnam pa'i sgo nas don la nyams su myong ba nges par byed pas nyams su myong ba nyid nges par byed pa ma yin par bstan pa ni dkar po las ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The ascertainment of the experience of the object is not by the form of the experience, as has been stated.

original: nges pa med na nyams su myong ba la rnam par rang gi ngo bo las nges par byed cing nges pa'i 'phen par byed kyi nges pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: nges pa med na nyams su myong ba la rnam par rang gi ngo bo las nges par byed cing nges pa'i 'phen par byed kyi nges pa ni ma yin te /
translated: If there is no ascertainment, then the experience is not ascertained from the entity of the aspect itself, and it is not an ascertainment that is projected.

original: rnam pa med pa nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam pa med pa nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not different from the absence of an aspect.

original: de'i rnam pa tsam las byung ba ni de'i mthar thug pa yin pa'i phyir don zhig par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la skad cig nyid sogs zhes bya ba smos @176b te ;
analyzed: de'i rnam pa tsam las byung ba ni de'i mthar thug pa yin pa'i phyir don zhig par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la skad cig nyid sogs zhes bya ba smos @176b te ;
translated: If one thinks that the object is destroyed because the arising from that mere aspect is its culmination, then the verse says ‚Äúthe momentariness, etc.‚Äù

original: tha mi dad pa nyid du nges pa'i yul de zhig pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa nyid du nges pa'i yul de zhig pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the object of ascertainment is not destroyed because it is not different.

original: nges pas kyang rnam pa dang phyi rol thob bya'i nyams su myong bar byed pa yang de las nges par byed pa ma yin par bstan pa ni de phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges pas kyang rnam pa dang phyi rol thob bya'i nyams su myong bar byed pa yang de las nges par byed pa ma yin par bstan pa ni de phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Also, ascertainment is not taught to be the experience of the obtained aspect and external object, which is ascertained from that. Therefore, the verse says ‚Äútherefore.‚Äù

original: rtogs par byed pa'i blo ni spyis yin te /
analyzed: rtogs par byed pa'i blo ni spyis yin te /
translated: The understanding is by way of the universal.

original: de'i rgyu nyid ni khyad par las yin no zhe na des na zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i rgyu nyid ni khyad par las yin no zhe na des na zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: If you say that the cause itself is the difference, then NƒÅgƒÅrjuna says, ‚ÄúIn that case . . .‚ÄùüîΩThe cause itself is also the object of comprehension for the sense faculties.üîΩThe cause itself is also the object of comprehension for the sense faculties.

original: rgyu nyid kyis rtogs bya ba nyid dbang po la yang yin te /üîΩrgyu nyid kyis zhes bya ba yang blos byas pa yin gyi dngos su ba'i 'brel pa la rag las pa ni ma yin te /üîΩgzhan du yang yod pa'i phyir mthong ba las gzhan du grub pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩrnam pa gnyis nyid yin na gzung ba dang cig shos kyi bdag nyid kyis tha dad pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: rgyu nyid kyis rtogs bya ba nyid dbang po la yang yin te / rgyu nyid kyis zhes bya ba yang blos byas pa yin gyi dngos su ba'i 'brel pa la rag las pa ni ma yin te / gzhan du yang yod pa'i phyir mthong ba las gzhan du grub pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // rnam pa gnyis nyid yin na gzung ba dang cig shos kyi bdag nyid kyis tha dad pa ma yin nam /
translated: The cause itself is also the object of comprehension for the sense faculties.üîΩThe cause itself is also the object of comprehension for the sense faculties.üîΩThe cause itself is also the object of comprehension for the sense faculties.

original: rnam pa dag nyid de lta bu yin no zhes zer ba la yang na zhes bya ba'o //üîΩrnam pa gcig gi ngo bo khyad par gang gi yin pa de'o //
analyzed: rnam pa dag nyid de lta bu yin no zhes zer ba la yang na zhes bya ba'o // rnam pa gcig gi ngo bo khyad par gang gi yin pa de'o //
translated: The cause itself is also the object of comprehension for the sense faculties.üîΩThe cause itself is also the object of comprehension for the sense faculties.üîΩThe cause itself is also original: khyad par lhag pa can ma yin pa nyid kyang 'dir khyad par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni gcig gis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par lhag pa can ma yin pa nyid kyang 'dir khyad par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni gcig gis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The cause itself is also the object of comprehension for the sense faculties.üîΩThe cause itself is also

original: 'di la gcig snang ba yin gyi gzung ba la sogs pa nyid ni ma yin na ji ltar rnam pa gnyis nyid yin zhes zer ba la cha gnyis la ni zhes bya ba ste khyad par ni de dang de las log pa yin la des byas pa'i rnam
analyzed: 'di la gcig snang ba yin gyi gzung ba la sogs pa nyid ni ma yin na ji ltar rnam pa gnyis nyid yin zhes zer ba la cha gnyis la ni zhes bya ba ste khyad par ni de dang de las log pa yin la des byas pa'i rnam
translated: The response to that is ‚ÄúThe two parts,‚Äù etc. The distinction is that which is the opposite of that and that which is produced by that.

original: pa gnyis nyid yin gyi sngon po dang ser po bzhin du snang ba'i dbye bas byas pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: pa gnyis nyid yin gyi sngon po dang ser po bzhin du snang ba'i dbye bas byas pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that there is a duality of aspects, but it is not produced by the division of the appearance of blue and yellow.

original: bde ba dang sngon po yang so sor snang ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: bde ba dang sngon po yang so sor snang ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt pleasure and blue also individually apparent?üîΩHow can they be the same in terms of engagement?

original: ji ltar gcig la rjes su 'jug pa yin zhes zer ba la rtogs pa dang sngon po'i rnam pa dag dbye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar gcig la rjes su 'jug pa yin zhes zer ba la rtogs pa dang sngon po'i rnam pa dag dbye ba med pa'o //
translated: The response to that is ‚ÄúThe aspects of the cognition and blue are not differentiated.‚Äù

original: de dag gis ma yin par bstan pa ni de dag kyang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de dag gis ma yin par bstan pa ni de dag kyang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The demonstration that they are not different is ‚ÄúThose two,‚Äù etc.

original: de dag kyang gcig la gnas pa'i rig pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dag kyang gcig la gnas pa'i rig pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that because they are the same in terms of the engagement of the cognition that is based on one, they are not different.

original: rang gi rig pa yin la sngon po ni rig par bya ba yin pas so so ba ma yin nam zhes zer ba ni gal te rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi rig pa yin la sngon po ni rig par bya ba yin pas so so ba ma yin nam zhes zer ba ni gal te rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you say, But the cognition is one's own awareness, and blue is what is to be cognized, so they are not the same, then we reply: If you say there are two ...

original: gzhan du na zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa yin na'o //
analyzed: gzhan du na zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa yin na'o //
translated: If you say, But they are different, then we reply: ... it is not in the aspect of that ...

original: de rnam can min ni tha dad pa'i phyir gzhan gyi rnam pa can tha mi dad pa sngon po'i rnam pa can no //
analyzed: de rnam can min ni tha dad pa'i phyir gzhan gyi rnam pa can tha mi dad pa sngon po'i rnam pa can no //
translated: If they are different, then the cognition is not in the aspect of that, because it is different. It is in the aspect of blue, which is not different from itself.

original: shes la ni dran pa la ji ltar gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes la ni dran pa la ji ltar gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: But how can it be in the aspect of memory?

original: dran par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dran par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It means it would not be memory.

original: rtogs pa'i sngon po dran bzhin pa ni ldog pa las tshul gnyis par brjod do zhes zer ba ni gal te bdag nyid de'i rnam par @177a * //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i sngon po dran bzhin pa ni ldog pa las tshul gnyis par brjod do zhes zer ba ni gal te bdag nyid de'i rnam par @177a * //
translated: The second way is stated from the perspective of remembering the blue that was cognized. If you say, But it is not the case that the cognition is in the aspect of that, then we reply: ... it is not in the aspect of that.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That is, it is not in the aspect of that.

original: nyams su myong ba dang yul gnyis nyams su myong ba dran pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba dang yul gnyis nyams su myong ba dran pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't memory of experience of both the object and the subject?

original: gcig la rnam pa gnyis ji ltar 'dod ces zer ba la 'di ltar phyi ma phyi ma'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gcig la rnam pa gnyis ji ltar 'dod ces zer ba la 'di ltar phyi ma phyi ma'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How can one have two aspects? We reply: ... the latter is the cause of the former.

original: rtogs pa'i sngon po las gzhan pa rang gi ngo bo ma rtogs pa mchog tu 'dzin pa la snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i sngon po las gzhan pa rang gi ngo bo ma rtogs pa mchog tu 'dzin pa la snang ba ma yin te /
translated: The appearance of the realization of blue is not the apprehension of the supreme, which is the non-realization of its own nature that is other than the realization of blue.

original: de ltar de la mchog tu 'dzin pa yin na 'di nyid gsum dang bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa tha dad par 'gyur ba'i phyir rgyun gyi legs par mtshon pa rmongs pa'i gnas ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ltar de la mchog tu 'dzin pa yin na 'di nyid gsum dang bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa tha dad par 'gyur ba'i phyir rgyun gyi legs par mtshon pa rmongs pa'i gnas ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If it were the apprehension of the supreme in that way, it would be different from this, the three, and the self, etc., and therefore the continuity would not be well-illustrated by the deluded state. This is the meaning.üîΩIf one were to apprehend the continuity as supreme, thinking ‚ÄúWhat do I have?‚Äù the non-appearance would be taught, saying ‚Äúwithout doubt.‚Äù

original: nga la ci zhig yod par gyur zhes rgyun mchog tu 'dzin na mi snang ba med par bstan pa ni gdon mi za bar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nga la ci zhig yod par gyur zhes rgyun mchog tu 'dzin na mi snang ba med par bstan pa ni gdon mi za bar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is not tenable to say,

original: re zhig 'di ltar rnam pa rnams //
analyzed: re zhig 'di ltar rnam pa rnams //
translated: ‚ÄúIn this way, the aspects

original: spros dang ldan par mthong ba min //üîΩzhes bya ba yang mi rigs so //
analyzed: spros dang ldan par mthong ba min // zhes bya ba yang mi rigs so //
translated: are not seen to be endowed with proliferation.‚ÄùüîΩBecause of the absence of a cause,

original: rgyu med phyir na 'jig rten pa //
analyzed: rgyu med phyir na 'jig rten pa //
translated: the worldlyüîΩdo not assert analysis,

original: dpyod par byed pa mi 'dod kyi //
analyzed: dpyod par byed pa mi 'dod kyi //
translated: but those who know reasoning analyze

original: stobs dang stobs min sogs bsgrub phyir //üîΩrigs par shes rnams dpyod par byed //
analyzed: stobs dang stobs min sogs bsgrub phyir //üîΩrigs par shes rnams dpyod par byed //
translated: in order to establish power, powerlessness, and so on.

original: ma dpyad par ni gnyis sam cig shos su yang zhes bya bar nges par ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ma dpyad par ni gnyis sam cig shos su yang zhes bya bar nges par ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Without analysis, it is not ascertained that it is either two or one.

original: 'di nyid ces bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis can gcig yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid ces bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis can gcig yin pa'o //
translated: This very [consciousness] is twofold.

original: rgyun gyi yongs su brtags pa de nyid mtshon pa'i thabs yin par bstan pa ni don gyi ngo bos zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rgyun gyi yongs su brtags pa de nyid mtshon pa'i thabs yin par bstan pa ni don gyi ngo bos zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The method of illustration of that very examination of the continuum is shown by the words by the nature of the object.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni dang po'o//
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni dang po'o//
translated: That refers to the first [moment].

original: don gyi ngo bos ni don gyi ngo bo dang lhan cig pa'o //
analyzed: don gyi ngo bos ni don gyi ngo bo dang lhan cig pa'o //
translated: By the nature of the object means together with the nature of the object.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni shugs kyis rang gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni shugs kyis rang gi ngo bo'o //
translated: That refers to the power, which is one's own nature.

original: de'i phyir rnam gnyis zhes bya ba ste rnam pa med pa dang / rig pa'i bdag nyid ma yin pa yang de lta bu'i khyad par gyi yul ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam gnyis zhes bya ba ste rnam pa med pa dang / rig pa'i bdag nyid ma yin pa yang de lta bu'i khyad par gyi yul ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, it is said to be twofold. The absence of aspects and the absence of the nature of cognition are also not the objects of such distinctions. This is the meaning.

original: yul du tha snyad 'dogs pa ni //
analyzed: yul du tha snyad 'dogs pa ni //
translated: The designation of objects

original: shes la des rtog med na min //
analyzed: shes la des rtog med na min //
translated: is in cognition, not without it.

original: de phyir shes bdag nyid gcig la //
analyzed: de phyir shes bdag nyid gcig la //
translated: Therefore, in a single cognition

original: gzung bya tha dad rgyu mtshan ni //
analyzed: gzung bya tha dad rgyu mtshan ni //
translated: the apprehended objects are different characteristics.

original: rig pa'i dbye ba 'grub 'di la //
analyzed: rig pa'i dbye ba 'grub 'di la //
translated: The division of awareness is established in this way.

original: rnam gzhag nged la ci zhig dgos snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: rnam gzhag nged la ci zhig dgos snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: One might think, ‚ÄúWhat is the use of this presentation?‚Äù

original: 'on te gnyis pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te gnyis pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Or rather, by the second.

original: bsre ba ni rig par bya ba dang / rig par byed pa dag tha dad par shes pa dag gcig tu byed pa'o //
analyzed: bsre ba ni rig par bya ba dang / rig par byed pa dag tha dad par shes pa dag gcig tu byed pa'o //
translated: Blending is the unification of the cognized and the cognizer, which are known to be different.

original: 'khrul pa yis zhes bya ba ni bsre ba'i bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pa yis zhes bya ba ni bsre ba'i bshad pa'o //
translated: By delusion is the explanation of blending.

original: 'di la rgal ba ni don 'bras nyid kyis zhes bya ba yin la /
analyzed: 'di la rgal ba ni don 'bras nyid kyis zhes bya ba yin la /
translated: Here the objection is ‚ÄúBy the result itself.‚Äù

original: de rjes su brjod nas bstan pa na snang ba dang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de rjes su brjod nas bstan pa na snang ba dang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: After stating that, the response is ‚ÄúAppearance and . . .‚Äù

original: 'brel pa med pa yul nyid yin na ni thal ches pa'i phyir rgyu ma yin zhing /
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa yul nyid yin na ni thal ches pa'i phyir rgyu ma yin zhing /
translated: If the object is unrelated, it is not the cause because it is too remote.üîΩIf the cause is not accepted as having an aspect, then it is just that, so it would also be appearance and mental activity.

original: rgyu yang rnam pa khas mi @177b len na de dag tsam yin pas snang ba dang yid la byed pa la yang 'gyur te dran pa la yang nyams su myong ba la bag chags kyis skyed par byed pa yin zhing dmigs pa yang rnam pa med na sked
analyzed: rgyu yang rnam pa khas mi @177b len na de dag tsam yin pas snang ba dang yid la byed pa la yang 'gyur te dran pa la yang nyams su myong ba la bag chags kyis skyed par byed pa yin zhing dmigs pa yang rnam pa med na sked
translated: If the aspect is not generated by the latent potentialities in memory, which is the experience, and if the object does not exist, then the cause of the appearance of the aspect is not established.

original: par byed pa tsam yin no //
analyzed: par byed pa tsam yin no //
translated: It is merely the agent.

original: byed pa po nyid kyang don la khyad par can du sked par byed pa yin gyi khyad par can las gzhan shes pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: byed pa po nyid kyang don la khyad par can du sked par byed pa yin gyi khyad par can las gzhan shes pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The agent itself is the distinguisher of the object, but consciousness is not other than the distinguisher.

original: skyed par byed pa yang dbang po la sogs pa nyid dang snang ba yang skyed par byed pa ni thal ches pa'i yul yin gyi gzugs kyi bdag nyid ni ma yin te yid la byed pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: skyed par byed pa yang dbang po la sogs pa nyid dang snang ba yang skyed par byed pa ni thal ches pa'i yul yin gyi gzugs kyi bdag nyid ni ma yin te yid la byed pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The producer is the sense faculty, etc., and the appearance is the producer. It is the domain of overextension, but it is not the nature of form, like mental attention. This is the meaning.

original: rtogs pa'i tshad nyid phul du byung ba rtogs par bya ba shes par byed pa po nyid kyi ngo bo bdag gi 'gyur ba ni shes pa yin no snyam du sems pa la gzugs la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i tshad nyid phul du byung ba rtogs par bya ba shes par byed pa po nyid kyi ngo bo bdag gi 'gyur ba ni shes pa yin no snyam du sems pa la gzugs la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The measure of understanding is the nature of the understanding of the excellent object. The nature of the agent is thought to be consciousness. In response to this, it is said that consciousness is not other than the nature of the understanding of form, etc.

original: rang gi rig pa'i rtogs pa'i ngo bo las gzhan pa shes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rang gi rig pa'i rtogs pa'i ngo bo las gzhan pa shes pa ma yin te /
translated: Consciousness is not other than the nature of the understanding of self-awareness.

original: rang gi rig pa'am gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni log par rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: rang gi rig pa'am gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni log par rtogs pa yin te /
translated: The thought or other is a misconception.

original: 'bras bu'i shes pa 'dzin pa'am dran pa yin na de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i don la de dag yod pa ma yin te thal ches pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i shes pa 'dzin pa'am dran pa yin na de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i don la de dag yod pa ma yin te thal ches pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: If the result is the cognition that apprehends or remembers, then it does not exist in the object that is not of the nature of that cognition, because that would be absurd.

original: de mi 'dzin na 'dzin pa las ni de'i 'bras bu ma yin pa yin te de'i 'bras bu yang de ltar mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /üîΩde bzhin 'bras bu thams cad kyang //
analyzed: de mi 'dzin na 'dzin pa las ni de'i 'bras bu ma yin pa yin te de'i 'bras bu yang de ltar mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni / de bzhin 'bras bu thams cad kyang //
translated: If it does not apprehend that, then it is not the result of that cognition, because its result is seen to be like that.üîΩThus, all results

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: are like the result of the eye.

original: shes pa la don gyi bskyed bya dbang po la sogs pa la mi srid pa'i 'brel pa cung zad yod pa yin gyi don gyi rnam pa ni ma yin la /
analyzed: shes pa la don gyi bskyed bya dbang po la sogs pa la mi srid pa'i 'brel pa cung zad yod pa yin gyi don gyi rnam pa ni ma yin la /
translated: In cognition, the object that is produced is related to the sense faculty, etc., but not to the aspect of the object.

original: de nyid kyi don 'dzin pa yin na rnam pa'i brtags pas ci zhig bya zhes zer ba ni 'on te bya ba la sos pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi don 'dzin pa yin na rnam pa'i brtags pas ci zhig bya zhes zer ba ni 'on te bya ba la sos pa'o //
translated: If that itself is the apprehender of the object, what is the use of postulating an aspect?

original: don dang 'dre ba bstan pa ni khyad pa can nye ba yin no //
analyzed: don dang 'dre ba bstan pa ni khyad pa can nye ba yin no //
translated: The teaching of the connection with the object is due to the proximity of the special.

original: don gyi rnam pa ni don gyi bskyed bya nye ba ste don gyi rnam pa nyid kho na yin par bstan pa ni 'dra ba las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don gyi rnam pa ni don gyi bskyed bya nye ba ste don gyi rnam pa nyid kho na yin par bstan pa ni 'dra ba las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The aspect of the object is the object's effect, which is proximate, and it is taught that the aspect of the object is just the aspect of the object itself.

original: don las de'i rnam pa can nyid nye ba yin la /
analyzed: don las de'i rnam pa can nyid nye ba yin la /
translated: The aspect of the object is proximate to it, but the aspect of the sense faculty and so on is not proximate to it.üîΩThe aspect of the object is similar to the object, but the aspect of the sense faculty and so on is not similar to the sense faculty and so on.

original: dbang po la sogs pa las ni rnam pa med pa nyid kyi skal ba ni rang gi rgyu brgyud pa las 'ongs pa yin gyi /üîΩde ma yin pa'i ngo bo 'dzin par byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa las ni rnam pa med pa nyid kyi skal ba ni rang gi rgyu brgyud pa las 'ongs pa yin gyi / de ma yin pa'i ngo bo 'dzin par byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The aspect of the object is the effect of the object, but the aspect of the sense faculty and so on is not the effect of the sense faculty and so on.üîΩThe aspect of the object is the cause of the consciousness, but the aspect of the sense faculty and so on is not the cause of the consciousness.

original: shes pa yod na don de'i yul du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yang de'i rnam pa 'di kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩmed par mi 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid do //üîΩsngon po'i shing zhes bya ba ni thag ring ba'i khyad par la'o //
analyzed: shes pa yod na don de'i yul du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yang de'i rnam pa 'di kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // med par mi 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid do // sngon po'i shing zhes bya ba ni thag ring ba'i khyad par la'o //
translated: The aspect of the object is the object of the consciousness, but the aspect of the sense faculty and so on is not the object of the consciousness.üîΩThe aspect of the object is the object of the consciousness, but the aspect of the sense faculty and so on is not the object of the consciousness.üîΩThe aspect of the object is the object of the consciousness, but the aspect of the sense faculty and so on is not the object of the consciousness.üîΩThe aspect of the object is the object of the consciousness, but the aspect of the sense faculty and so on is not the object of the consciousness.üîΩThe aspect of the object is the object of the consciousness, but the aspect of the sense faculty and so on is not the object of the consciousness.üîΩThe aspect of the object is the object of the consciousness, but the aspect of the sense faculty and so on is not the object of the consciousness.üîΩThe aspect of the object is the object of the consciousness, but the aspect of the sense faculty and so on is not the object of the consciousness.üîΩThe aspect of the object is the object of the consciousness, but the aspect of the sense faculty and so on is not the object of the consciousness.üîΩThe aspect of the object is the object of the consciousness, but the aspect of the sense faculty and so on is not the object of the consciousness.üîΩThe aspect of the object is the object of the consciousness, but the aspect of the sense faculty and so on is not the object of the consciousness.

original: de'i 'bras bu nyid kyis shes pa dran pas don dran pa ma yin pa de lta na cir 'gyur @178a * //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu nyid kyis shes pa dran pas don dran pa ma yin pa de lta na cir 'gyur @178a * //
translated: The aspect of the object is the object of the consciousness, but the aspect of the sense faculty and so on is not the object of the consciousness.

original: zhes zer ba la dang po zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes zer ba la dang po zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The aspect of the object is the object of

original: dang po gcig gi shes pa tsam gyis gzung ba la'o //
analyzed: dang po gcig gi shes pa tsam gyis gzung ba la'o //
translated: The first is the mere consciousness of one.

original: rnam pa med pa nyid dang rang gi rig pa ma yin pa nyid dag gis dang po ba gnyi ga'i rang bzhin nyid ma yin na 'byed par 'gyur ba ma yin te tha dad par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa med pa nyid dang rang gi rig pa ma yin pa nyid dag gis dang po ba gnyi ga'i rang bzhin nyid ma yin na 'byed par 'gyur ba ma yin te tha dad par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Without the aspects, and without self-awareness, the first is not the nature of both, and so it is not differentiated, not different.

original: nges par 'dzin pa'i sems kyis zhes bya ba ni nges par dpyod pa'i sems kyis te /
analyzed: nges par 'dzin pa'i sems kyis zhes bya ba ni nges par dpyod pa'i sems kyis te /
translated: The mind that ascertains means the mind that investigates.

original: dang po'i shes pa tsam dang gnyis pa gzhan yang rang gi 'dzin byed la snang bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dang po'i shes pa tsam dang gnyis pa gzhan yang rang gi 'dzin byed la snang bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The first is the mere consciousness, and the second is also the appearance in the apprehender.

original: nges par 'dzin par mi byed pa su zhig gis yin zhes zer ba la gnyis pa nges par 'dzin pa yi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges par 'dzin par mi byed pa su zhig gis yin zhes zer ba la gnyis pa nges par 'dzin pa yi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Who is it that does not ascertain? The second is the ascertainer.

original: phan tshun tha dad pa kho na shes pa snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: phan tshun tha dad pa kho na shes pa snang ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not that consciousness appears as just different from each other.

original: rnam pa'i khyad par nyams su myong ba ma yin par bstan pa ni don bsre ba dang 'brel pa can te /
analyzed: rnam pa'i khyad par nyams su myong ba ma yin par bstan pa ni don bsre ba dang 'brel pa can te /
translated: The teaching that there is no experience of the difference of the aspects is connected with the mixing of the objects.

original: ldan pa sngon po'o zhes don dang bsre ba dang ldan pa yin gyi rnam pa med pa'i shes pa nyams su myong ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ldan pa sngon po'o zhes don dang bsre ba dang ldan pa yin gyi rnam pa med pa'i shes pa nyams su myong ba ni ma yin te /
translated: The meaning is that the cognition is associated with the object, not that the cognition is experienced without an aspect,

original: rnam pa nyid mngon sum pa yin pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: rnam pa nyid mngon sum pa yin pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: because the aspect itself is the direct perception.

original: / rig pa tsam gyi rtogs bya rnam pa dang bcas pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang mngon sum yin te /üîΩrigs pas dpyod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: / rig pa tsam gyi rtogs bya rnam pa dang bcas pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang mngon sum yin te / rigs pas dpyod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The object of cognition is not associated with an aspect, but it is a direct perception,üîΩbecause it is analyzed by reasoning.

original: de'i phyir ni rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir ni rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of reasoning‚Äù means because of the reasoning.

original: don gyi rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir zhes bya bas yul gyi yul can gyi rigs pa bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: don gyi rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir zhes bya bas yul gyi yul can gyi rigs pa bstan pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause it has the aspect of the object‚Äù indicates the reasoning of the object of the object.

original: 'brel pa ni ngo bo yin gyi nges par 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa ni ngo bo yin gyi nges par 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The connection is the nature of the object, not the apprehension of the object.

original: rnam pa med pa la ni de'i tshe bdag gis don gang yang 'dzin pa yin par mi dran no zhes gzung ba'i ngo bo dang bral ba'i 'dzin pa skye ba dran pa byed pa de'i phyir 'gal ba'am ma nges pa yin no snyam du sems pa ni gal
analyzed: rnam pa med pa la ni de'i tshe bdag gis don gang yang 'dzin pa yin par mi dran no zhes gzung ba'i ngo bo dang bral ba'i 'dzin pa skye ba dran pa byed pa de'i phyir 'gal ba'am ma nges pa yin no snyam du sems pa ni gal
translated: Thus, he thinks that the arising of the apprehension that is devoid of the nature of the apprehended is contradictory or indeterminate.

original: te 'ba' zhig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: te 'ba' zhig ces bya ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is used in the verse.

original: ci zhig bzung zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i spyi la nges pa yin gyi de dag gi khyad par la ni the tshom za ba yin te /
analyzed: ci zhig bzung zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i spyi la nges pa yin gyi de dag gi khyad par la ni the tshom za ba yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat is apprehended?‚Äù refers to the ascertainment of the general characteristics of the apprehended and the apprehender, but there is doubt about their specific characteristics.

original: gcig la ma nges par zer ba la bzung la zhes bya ba ste /üîΩnges par 'dzin pa dang cig shos dag tha dad pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gcig la ma nges par zer ba la bzung la zhes bya ba ste / nges par 'dzin pa dang cig shos dag tha dad pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is used in the sense that there is no ascertainment of one in the other.

original: der ni zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa la shes pa 'ba' zhig pa nyid ni 'dzin pa nyid dang 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: der ni zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa la shes pa 'ba' zhig pa nyid ni 'dzin pa nyid dang 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúthere‚Äù refers to the apprehension. The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù indicates that the cognition is contradictory to the apprehension itself.üîΩThe word ‚Äúif‚Äù is used in the sense that the apprehension is not different from the other.

original: gzhan nyid du gyur pa zhes bya ba ni nyams su myong ba'i dus su'o //
analyzed: gzhan nyid du gyur pa zhes bya ba ni nyams su myong ba'i dus su'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving become different‚Äù means at the time of experience.

original: de lta bur gyur pa nyid ni 'dzin byed ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa nyid ni 'dzin byed ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúNot being the apprehender‚Äù means not being the apprehender in that way.

original: de kho na ltar ni 'dzin pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de kho na ltar ni 'dzin pa nyid kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that way‚Äù means by apprehending.

original: de'i phyir ni 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir ni 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù means because of apprehending.

original: de zhes bya ba @178b ni gzung ba'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba @178b ni gzung ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the apprehended.

original: de'i phyir 'ba' zhig nyid 'dzin pa nyid ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'ba' zhig nyid 'dzin pa nyid ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it would follow that the mere thing is not the apprehender.

original: de la brten pa ni gzung ba la brten pa'o //
analyzed: de la brten pa ni gzung ba la brten pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBased on that‚Äù means based on the apprehended.

original: dbye bar mi nus pa zhes bya ba ni dran pas sam nyams su myong bas tha mi dad par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbye bar mi nus pa zhes bya ba ni dran pas sam nyams su myong bas tha mi dad par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúCannot be distinguished‚Äù means that it is realized to be undifferentiated by memory or experience.

original: dang por rang bzhin gnyis min na //
analyzed: dang por rang bzhin gnyis min na //
translated: If at first it is not of a dual nature,

original: zhes bya ba la yang sngon po la sogs pa'i gzung ba'i stobs kyis gzhan las 'byed pa nyid ma yin nam zhes zer ba la gzhan du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la yang sngon po la sogs pa'i gzung ba'i stobs kyis gzhan las 'byed pa nyid ma yin nam zhes zer ba la gzhan du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is said that ‚Äúit is not distinguished from another‚Äù by the power of the apprehended, such as blue, and so on.

original: gal te yang zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi bshad pa ni de skad du yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gal te yang zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi bshad pa ni de skad du yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The explanation of ‚Äúalso‚Äù in the verse is ‚Äúin that way.‚Äù

original: shes byed bstan pa nyid ni gzung ba'i yul ma yin pa nyid la /
analyzed: shes byed bstan pa nyid ni gzung ba'i yul ma yin pa nyid la /
translated: The very teaching of the instrument is that it is not an apprehended object.

original: de la nges par 'dzin pa ma yin pa'i phyir la de'i 'dzin pa la sogs pa yang 'byed pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la nges par 'dzin pa ma yin pa'i phyir la de'i 'dzin pa la sogs pa yang 'byed pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not a definite apprehension of that, and that it is also a differentiation of the apprehension of that.

original: thag ring po'i don gyi rnam pa las kyang skye ba ni de'i rnam pa can dang de'i 'dzin byed du yang 'gyur bar bstan pa ni de'i zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: thag ring po'i don gyi rnam pa las kyang skye ba ni de'i rnam pa can dang de'i 'dzin byed du yang 'gyur bar bstan pa ni de'i zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is taught that arising from the aspect of a distant object would also have the aspect of that and would apprehend that.

original: don gyi rnam pa can gyi shes pa de las te dang po las so //
analyzed: don gyi rnam pa can gyi shes pa de las te dang po las so //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúfrom that‚Äù is from that consciousness that has the aspect of the object, from the first.üîΩThe thought is that consciousness and the object of consciousness are different, but a consciousness that exists in mutual dependence cannot be made otherwise.

original: shes pa dang shes bya tha dad pa yang phan tshun ltos pa'i shes pa yod pa can ni gzhan du bya bar mi nus so snyam du sems pa ni 'on te shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes pa dang shes bya tha dad pa yang phan tshun ltos pa'i shes pa yod pa can ni gzhan du bya bar mi nus so snyam du sems pa ni 'on te shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú But if consciousness‚Äù is stated.

original: ci las she na de lag nas pa nyid ces bya ba smos so //
analyzed: ci las she na de lag nas pa nyid ces bya ba smos so //
translated: From what? ‚Äú From that.‚Äù

original: des na zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsdu ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù means ‚Äúin summary.‚Äù
