original: shes pa dang shes bya dag lhan cig pa nyid kyi ngo bo dang dmigs pa yang yul dang yul can gyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shes pa dang shes bya dag lhan cig pa nyid kyi ngo bo dang dmigs pa yang yul dang yul can gyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the nature of the cognition and the cognized is simultaneous, and the object and subject are the same.

original: tha dad par mi rigs na yul la sogs pa nyid lhan cig pa nyid kyang mi rigs par bstan pa ni gnyis dag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha dad par mi rigs na yul la sogs pa nyid lhan cig pa nyid kyang mi rigs par bstan pa ni gnyis dag ces bya ba'o //
translated: If it is not tenable that they are different, then it is also untenable that they are simultaneous. This is demonstrated by ‚Äúthe two.‚Äù

original: dbang po la sogs pa nyid kyi blo ni sngon po rtogs pa la sogs pa'i ngo bos shugs kyis gzhan yin par zer ba la sngon po'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa nyid kyi blo ni sngon po rtogs pa la sogs pa'i ngo bos shugs kyis gzhan yin par zer ba la sngon po'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The cognition that is the sense faculty and so on is said to be different by implication through the nature of the cognition of blue and so on. ‚ÄúThe aspect of blue‚Äù is the cognition of blue.

original: sngon po mthong ba na bde ba mthong ba ni shes pa nyid ma yin par khas blangs par bstan pa ni bde ba la sogs pa'i ngo bor na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngon po mthong ba na bde ba mthong ba ni shes pa nyid ma yin par khas blangs par bstan pa ni bde ba la sogs pa'i ngo bor na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The demonstration that it is accepted that when blue is seen, the seeing of pleasure is not the cognition itself is ‚Äúin the nature of pleasure and so on.‚Äù

original: bde ba'i shes pa yang gzhan gyi 'dzin byed ma yin te khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba'i shes pa yang gzhan gyi 'dzin byed ma yin te khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Nor is the cognition of pleasure the apprehender of another, because there is no difference. This is indicated by the words ‚Äújust as‚Äù .

original: de med kyang ni 'dzin byed nyid med na yang ngo //
analyzed: de med kyang ni 'dzin byed nyid med na yang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúEven without it‚Äù means even without the nature of the apprehender.

original: bde ba la sogs pa gzhan gang yang rung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa gzhan gang yang rung ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not any other, such as pleasure, etc.

original: de dmigs na gdon mi za bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dmigs na gdon mi za bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because when that is perceived, it is certainly perceived.

original: gang zhig ces bya ba ni snang ba'o //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba ni snang ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the appearance.

original: gang med par yang zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa nyid med par yang ngo //
analyzed: gang med par yang zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa nyid med par yang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúEven without‚Äù means even without the nature of the apprehender.

original: des byas pa ni 'dzin pa nyid byas pa'i 'dzin pa ste /üîΩbde ba la @179a * //
analyzed: des byas pa ni 'dzin pa nyid byas pa'i 'dzin pa ste / bde ba la @179a * //
translated: ‚ÄúProduced by that‚Äù means produced by the nature of the apprehender.

original: sogs pa 'dzin pa'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sogs pa 'dzin pa'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it has the nature of the apprehender of pleasure, etc.

original: rang gi ngo bo khyad par gyis ni snang du rung bas so //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo khyad par gyis ni snang du rung bas so //
translated: Because it is suitable to appear by the distinction of its own nature.

original: byas pa ni rab tu sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: byas pa ni rab tu sbyar ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúProduced‚Äù means applied.

original: de med par ni gzhan gyi sems la'o //
analyzed: de med par ni gzhan gyi sems la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout that‚Äù means in another mind.

original: sngon po la sogs pa lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid ni dang po'i shes pa la gnyis par nges par rtogs pa ni lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid 'dzin pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid ni dang po'i shes pa la gnyis par nges par rtogs pa ni lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid 'dzin pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúgrasping the non-hidden‚Äù is that the first consciousness, which is not hidden, definitely realizes the second consciousness.

original: lkog tu ma gyur pa'i sngon po dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i bde ba rnam pa med pa tshogs pa gcig las 'byung ba ni 'di nyid 'dzin pa yin no snyam du sems pa la gyur pa yin du zin kyang zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: lkog tu ma gyur pa'i sngon po dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i bde ba rnam pa med pa tshogs pa gcig las 'byung ba ni 'di nyid 'dzin pa yin no snyam du sems pa la gyur pa yin du zin kyang zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Even if one thinks that the non-hidden blue and the non-manifest pleasure that arise from the same collection grasp this very [blue], [the opponent] says, ‚Äúeven if that is so.‚Äù

original: yul du ma shes pa gcig la rkyang pa bzhin du snang ba ni bde ba dang sngon po la sogs pa rang gi rig pa gcig gi khongs su gtogs pa ni gcig yin te /
analyzed: yul du ma shes pa gcig la rkyang pa bzhin du snang ba ni bde ba dang sngon po la sogs pa rang gi rig pa gcig gi khongs su gtogs pa ni gcig yin te /
translated: The non-hidden blue and the pleasure that arise from the same collection appear as one to a single consciousness, like a single horse. The pleasure and blue, etc. that belong to a single self-awareness are one.

original: rnam pa lta bu'o zhes bstan pa ni nges par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa lta bu'o zhes bstan pa ni nges par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúdefinitely‚Äù is that it is like the aspect.

original: cig car du ni rang rig pa gcig gi khongs su gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: cig car du ni rang rig pa gcig gi khongs su gtogs pa'o //
translated: Simultaneously, they belong to a single self-awareness.

original: nges par zhes bya ba ni so so ba ma yin par dmigs pa las tha mi dad pa'i dmigs pa nyid do //üîΩlhan cig tu zhes bya ba ni rkyang pa rig pa nyid ni gcig nyid ma yin te rkyang pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nges par zhes bya ba ni so so ba ma yin par dmigs pa las tha mi dad pa'i dmigs pa nyid do // lhan cig tu zhes bya ba ni rkyang pa rig pa nyid ni gcig nyid ma yin te rkyang pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúCertainly‚Äù means that the object is not different from the object that is not separate.

original: du ma ma yin te rig pa gcig gi khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: du ma ma yin te rig pa gcig gi khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúTogether‚Äù means that the object is not one, because it is not singular, and it is not many, because it is included in one cognition.

original: du ma bzhin gcig ma yin te rig pa gcig gi khongs su gtogs pas gcig nyid du nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni yul ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: du ma bzhin gcig ma yin te rig pa gcig gi khongs su gtogs pas gcig nyid du nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni yul ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is not one, as it were, many, because it is ascertained as one, being included in one cognition. This is indicated by ‚Äúthe object.‚Äù

original: tha mi dad pa nyid rkyang pa yin pa'i phyir tha dad par tha snyad 'dogs pa la brten par mthong bar bstan pa'i rnam shes 'khrul pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa nyid rkyang pa yin pa'i phyir tha dad par tha snyad 'dogs pa la brten par mthong bar bstan pa'i rnam shes 'khrul pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is seen that nondifference is based on the convention of difference, because of singularity. This is indicated by ‚Äúthe delusion of consciousness.‚Äù

original: tha dad pa'i bag chags kyi snying po can yin pa'i phyir rnam shes 'khrul pa gang dag gi yin pa de dag gis mthong ba ste /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i bag chags kyi snying po can yin pa'i phyir rnam shes 'khrul pa gang dag gi yin pa de dag gis mthong ba ste /
translated: That which is the essence of the habitual notion of difference is the delusion of consciousness. That which is the object of that is seen.

original: tha dad pa'i yul gyi mthong ba srid pa'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i yul gyi mthong ba srid pa'o //
translated: The seeing of different objects is possible.

original: zla ba'i ni rab rib can la snang ba'o //
analyzed: zla ba'i ni rab rib can la snang ba'o //
translated: The moon is seen by one with cataracts.

original: gnyis med par zhes bya ba ni rig pa gcig gi khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis med par zhes bya ba ni rig pa gcig gi khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Non-difference means that it belongs to a single cognition.

original: de tha dad pa'i bag chags yin na rgyud gzhan lta bu'i tshul du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de tha dad pa'i bag chags yin na rgyud gzhan lta bu'i tshul du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were a different latent impression, it would follow that it belongs to a different continuum.

original: gcig nyid la ni rig pa gcig gi khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig nyid la ni rig pa gcig gi khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In a single [object], it belongs to a single cognition.

original: bdag nyid la yang ni rang rig pa la ste de'i rnam pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid la yang ni rang rig pa la ste de'i rnam pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In itself, it is self-cognition, because it is distinguished by its particular aspect.

original: rab rib can gyi rnam pa gnyis la'am de dang ldan pa'i mthong ba la mthong ba tha dad pa mngon par 'dod pa ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: rab rib can gyi rnam pa gnyis la'am de dang ldan pa'i mthong ba la mthong ba tha dad pa mngon par 'dod pa ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't the seeing of the two aspects of one with cataracts or the seeing of one with cataracts itself accepted as different?

original: tha mi dad pas de'i yul gyi zla ba ni @179b yin no snyam du sems pa ni gal te yul zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha mi dad pas de'i yul gyi zla ba ni @179b yin no snyam du sems pa ni gal te yul zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is thought that the moon, the object of that [cognition], is not different, then the object is so-called.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ni khyad par yin pa'i phyir 'di ji lta bu yin pa de lta bu rab rib can ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ni khyad par yin pa'i phyir 'di ji lta bu yin pa de lta bu rab rib can ni ma yin no //
translated: Because the aspects of consciousness are different, they are distinct.

original: de'i bdag nyid la ni zla ba gnyis kyi rnam pa'i shes pa'i bdag nyid la'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid la ni zla ba gnyis kyi rnam pa'i shes pa'i bdag nyid la'o //
translated: In the nature of that, i.e., in the nature of the consciousness that has the aspect of two moons,

original: de zhes bya ba ni gzhan nam rang rig gi ngo bo'i'o//
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni gzhan nam rang rig gi ngo bo'i'o//
translated: that, i.e., the nature of the other, or the nature of self-awareness,üîΩis seen to have the essence of different latent impressions.

original: tha dad pa'i bag chags kyi snying po can gyi mthong ba'i bdag nyid can ni de skyed par mthong bar 'dod pa'i yul yin te /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i bag chags kyi snying po can gyi mthong ba'i bdag nyid can ni de skyed par mthong bar 'dod pa'i yul yin te /
translated: The nature of seeing is the object that is seen to produce that.

original: gzhan nyid yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan nyid yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The demonstration that it is different is:

original: gal te rang gi ngo bo ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te rang gi ngo bo ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the nature of that is different,

original: gzhan du ni gzhan gyi ngo bo ste rang gi rig pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du ni gzhan gyi ngo bo ste rang gi rig pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then it is the nature of another, because it has the nature of self-awareness.

original: 'di nyid kyi phyir gzhan gyi ngo bo yang rang gi ngo bos shes par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi phyir gzhan gyi ngo bo yang rang gi ngo bos shes par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: For this very reason, the nature of another is not known by its own nature.

original: gang gi phyir gzhan gyi ngo bo ni rang la yod pa rnam par bya ba yin gyi rnam pa med pas ni mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhan gyi ngo bo ni rang la yod pa rnam par bya ba yin gyi rnam pa med pas ni mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because the nature of another is an activity that exists for itself, but it is not tenable that it is without aspects.

original: tha dad par rtogs par nus pa ma yin pa ni zhes bya ba rang rig pa'i khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad par rtogs par nus pa ma yin pa ni zhes bya ba rang rig pa'i khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That which is not able to be cognized as different is included within self-awareness.

original: tha dad par ma rtogs na rigs pa ci yin zhes zer ba la gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha dad par ma rtogs na rigs pa ci yin zhes zer ba la gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is not cognized as different, what is the point of it being a cognition?

original: rnam pa sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang sngon po la sogs pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang sngon po la sogs pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúVarious‚Äù means having the nature of pleasure, blue, and so on.

original: gzhan du ni du ma nyid du'o //
analyzed: gzhan du ni du ma nyid du'o //
translated: Otherwise, it would be multiple.

original: mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs par nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs par nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: Because that is untenable.

original: zla ba gnyis ni gcig nyid ma yin par rang gis rig pa ma yin te tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zla ba gnyis ni gcig nyid ma yin par rang gis rig pa ma yin te tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Two moons are not cognized by themselves as not being one because they are different.

original: gzhan gyis kyang ma yin te rnam pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni rang dang gzhan dag gis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis kyang ma yin te rnam pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni rang dang gzhan dag gis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Nor are they cognized by another because it would be without aspects. This is indicated by ‚Äúby itself or another.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtsom pa nyid kyi tshe bshad zin to //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtsom pa nyid kyi tshe bshad zin to //
translated: The phrase for this reason and so on has already been explained at the time of the composition.

original: tha dad pa dran par bya ba yang sngon po dang ser po gcig tu dmigs par mthong ba ma yin nam zhes zer ba la de lta na 'o na zhes bya ba ni ste /
analyzed: tha dad pa dran par bya ba yang sngon po dang ser po gcig tu dmigs par mthong ba ma yin nam zhes zer ba la de lta na 'o na zhes bya ba ni ste /
translated: But isn't the memory of difference also seen to apprehend blue and yellow as one? The phrase if that is so means that.

original: tha mi dad par 'dzin pa de yang rkyang pa la dmigs pa'i phyir gcig nyid yin la tha dad par 'dzin pa'i dran pa ni 'khrul pas so //
analyzed: tha mi dad par 'dzin pa de yang rkyang pa la dmigs pa'i phyir gcig nyid yin la tha dad par 'dzin pa'i dran pa ni 'khrul pas so //
translated: That apprehension of non-difference is also one because it is the apprehension of a single entity. The memory of the apprehension of difference is mistaken.

original: de lta bu'i rig par byed pa las sngon po'i rig pa ma yin te rig pa nyid kho na mi dran na de mi dran pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: de lta bu'i rig par byed pa las sngon po'i rig pa ma yin te rig pa nyid kho na mi dran na de mi dran pa'i phyir ro//
translated: The cognition of blue is not from such an instrument of knowledge, because if the cognition itself is not remembered, it is not remembered.

original: nges pas zhes bya ba yang 'di nyid kyi khyad par brjod pa'i ched du yin par bstan pa ni de ni de bzhin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges pas zhes bya ba yang 'di nyid kyi khyad par brjod pa'i ched du yin par bstan pa ni de ni de bzhin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase because of ascertainment is also stated for the purpose of expressing the distinction of this. The phrase that is so indicates that.

original: 'dod na ni zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pas tha dad par rnam par gcad pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod na ni zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pas tha dad par rnam par gcad pa'o //
translated: The phrase if one wishes means to eliminate difference through error.

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni nges pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni nges pa med pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThus‚Äù means ‚Äúwithout any doubt.‚Äù

original: sngon po ni tha dad par dmigs pa'i sngon po ste rkyang pa dmigs pa yin @180a * //
analyzed: sngon po ni tha dad par dmigs pa'i sngon po ste rkyang pa dmigs pa yin @180a * //
translated: Blue is a different object of observation than yellow because it is observed as separate from yellow, since it is observed as a single unit.

original: pa'i phyir gcig nyid du 'gal bas ser po bsal ba yin gyi rang gi dmigs pa la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: pa'i phyir gcig nyid du 'gal bas ser po bsal ba yin gyi rang gi dmigs pa la ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is excluded from yellow, but not from its own object of observation, because it would follow that it would not exist.

original: rang nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ni so sor tha dad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ni so sor tha dad ces bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúeach separately‚Äù teaches this.

original: de bzhin du bde ba dang sngon po dag gcig par dmigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du bde ba dang sngon po dag gcig par dmigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Likewise, pleasure and blue are not observed as the same,

original: de dag ni 'gal ba dmigs pa gcig par dmigs pa'i khongs su gtogs pa ma yin par de ltar brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni //
analyzed: de dag ni 'gal ba dmigs pa gcig par dmigs pa'i khongs su gtogs pa ma yin par de ltar brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni //
translated: because it is said that they are included in the category of ‚Äúthe observation of mutually exclusive objects.‚Äù

original: rtag pa dang ni cig shos dag / ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtag pa dang ni cig shos dag / ces bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe permanent and the impermanent‚Äù teaches this.

original: 'gal ba ni phan tshun dmigs pa la rjes su zhugs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba ni phan tshun dmigs pa la rjes su zhugs pa med pa'o //
translated: Mutually exclusive means that they do not occur together.

original: gnyis pa ni bde ba dang sngon po dag la ste /
analyzed: gnyis pa ni bde ba dang sngon po dag la ste /
translated: The second is pleasure and blue.

original: bde ba ni rang gi rig pa'i rtogs pa yin pa de lta na yang rnam pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bde ba ni rang gi rig pa'i rtogs pa yin pa de lta na yang rnam pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Happiness is the realization of one‚Äôs own awareness, and so it is said to be ‚Äúwith an aspect.‚Äù

original: rnam par dbye ba med pa ni rang rig pa gcig gi khongs su gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba med pa ni rang rig pa gcig gi khongs su gtogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNon-differentiation‚Äù means that it is included within the one self-awareness.

original: de nyid dang ni rang rig pa dang ngo //
analyzed: de nyid dang ni rang rig pa dang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúThat very‚Äù means self-awareness.

original: rig par bya ba dang rig par byed pa dag sngon po dang ser po bzhin du tha dad par rig pa ma yin par bstan pa ni myong ba med par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rig par bya ba dang rig par byed pa dag sngon po dang ser po bzhin du tha dad par rig pa ma yin par bstan pa ni myong ba med par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is not taught that the object of awareness and the agent of awareness are different from each other, like blue and yellow. ‚ÄúWithout experience‚Äù means

original: rang gi rig pa gcig la rjes su zhugs pa yin par bstan pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi rig pa gcig la rjes su zhugs pa yin par bstan pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn this way‚Äù teaches that it is included within the one self-awareness.

original: bde ba dang sngon po dang de nyid kyi phyir tha dad par snang yang tha mi dad pa'am tha dad pa'i 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni tha dad par ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba dang sngon po dang de nyid kyi phyir tha dad par snang yang tha mi dad pa'am tha dad pa'i 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni tha dad par ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAlthough they appear as different‚Äù teaches that because there is no effect that is either non-different or different, happiness, blue, and so on are not different.

original: tha dad rig pa zhes bya ba ni de snyed la sogs pa'i tha dad pa nyid kyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: tha dad rig pa zhes bya ba ni de snyed la sogs pa'i tha dad pa nyid kyi khyad par ro //
translated: The so-called ‚Äúawareness of difference‚Äù is the difference of the particularities of those many things, etc.

original: rig pa las bzhin du ser po las kyang sngon po tha mi dad pa'i rig pa can gcig nyid yin par bstan pa ni blang bya dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rig pa las bzhin du ser po las kyang sngon po tha mi dad pa'i rig pa can gcig nyid yin par bstan pa ni blang bya dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Just as with awareness, there is a single awareness of blue that is not different from the awareness of yellow, etc., and this is indicated by ‚Äúthe object to be grasped.‚Äù

original: dus gzhan la tha dad par rig pa ni gzhan nyid yin par bstan pa ni de'i tshe zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dus gzhan la tha dad par rig pa ni gzhan nyid yin par bstan pa ni de'i tshe zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Awareness of difference at another time is indicated by ‚Äúat that time,‚Äù which shows that it is different.

original: tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa rig pa'i ser po gcig tu brtags nas ma nges pa'i 'khrul pa yin par bstan pa ni tha dad pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa rig pa'i ser po gcig tu brtags nas ma nges pa'i 'khrul pa yin par bstan pa ni tha dad pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The error of uncertainty is indicated by ‚Äúdifference,‚Äù which is the designation of a single yellow that is both different and not different from awareness.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'i rnam 'grel gyi don ni gcig dmigs pa'i rang bzhin du gzhan la'ang khyad par med pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'i rnam 'grel gyi don ni gcig dmigs pa'i rang bzhin du gzhan la'ang khyad par med pa yin te /
translated: The meaning of the commentary on ‚Äútherefore‚Äù is that there is no difference in the nature of the observation of one thing and another.

original: gzhan du na 'di la yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i dpyad pa tsam yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan du na 'di la yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i dpyad pa tsam yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is just an analysis that says, ‚ÄúIt would be so in this case as well.‚Äù

original: don snang ba yin na shes pa'i rnam pa nyid thob par 'gyur na zhes pa ji ltar yin nges pa ma yin na yang de dang ldan pa nyid las dbye ba yin gyi rig pa las ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni shes pa 'ba' zhigüîΩces bya ba'o //
analyzed: don snang ba yin na shes pa'i rnam pa nyid thob par 'gyur na zhes pa ji ltar yin nges pa ma yin na yang de dang ldan pa nyid las dbye ba yin gyi rig pa las ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni shes pa 'ba' zhig ces bya ba'o //
translated: This is the sole consciousness.

original: rgyu nyid ni sked par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu nyid ni sked par byed pa'o //
translated: The cause itself is the waist.

original: @180b tha dad par ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: @180b tha dad par ni khyad par ro //
translated: The difference is the distinction.

original: 'gyur ba ni shes pa'i rnam pa'i khyad par las so zhes rjes su dpog pa ni don gyi nus pa yin te /
analyzed: 'gyur ba ni shes pa'i rnam pa'i khyad par las so zhes rjes su dpog pa ni don gyi nus pa yin te /
translated: The transformation is from the distinction of the aspect of consciousness. This is the potency of the object,

original: de'i rnam pa ma yin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa ma yin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would not obtain the aspect of that.

original: rang gi rnam pa la don du lhag par mos pa'i phyir srid pa'am /
analyzed: rang gi rnam pa la don du lhag par mos pa'i phyir srid pa'am /
translated: Because it is the superimposition of the object on its own aspect, it is possible.üîΩOr, if it does not apprehend that, it does not apprehend the connection, so existence is merely what is desired.

original: de mi 'dzin na 'brel pa mi 'dzin pas srid pa ni mngon par 'dod pa tsam yin pa'i phyir la de nyid kyi na sngon po 'di zhes shes pa la /
analyzed: de mi 'dzin na 'brel pa mi 'dzin pas srid pa ni mngon par 'dod pa tsam yin pa'i phyir la de nyid kyi na sngon po 'di zhes shes pa la /
translated: Therefore, in the cognition of this blue,

original: phyi rol sngon por nges rtog yin //
analyzed: phyi rol sngon por nges rtog yin //
translated: it is the ascertainment of external blue.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: srid pa la yang rgyu mtshan med par thal bar 'gyur phyir rgyu mtshan bstan pa ni rgyu gzhan dag ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: srid pa la yang rgyu mtshan med par thal bar 'gyur phyir rgyu mtshan bstan pa ni rgyu gzhan dag ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It follows that there would be no reason for existence, so he teaches the reason: ‚Äúbecause of the other causes.‚Äù

original: ldog pa tsam las 'jug pa yin /
analyzed: ldog pa tsam las 'jug pa yin /
translated: The mere negation is the engagement.

original: zhes bya ba ni spyi mthong ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni spyi mthong ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: This is the definition of seeing the universal.

original: 'o na de zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis nyid don yin no zhes bya ba'i 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na de zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis nyid don yin no zhes bya ba'i 'gal ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBut that‚Äù is the contradiction of the statement that the two aspects are the object.

original: de'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyi rnam pa dang 'dra ba nyid yin gyi rjes su dpag pa la ni de'i rnam pa dang 'dra ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyi rnam pa dang 'dra ba nyid yin gyi rjes su dpag pa la ni de'i rnam pa dang 'dra ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúIts aspect‚Äù means that it is just like the aspect of direct perception, but inference does not have that aspect. This is the meaning.

original: 'dir ni rig pa tsam la'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni rig pa tsam la'o //
translated: Here, it is just the awareness.

original: gnas pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ni dogs nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnas pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ni dogs nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúThe position of the opponent‚Äù means the opponent‚Äôs doubt.

original: ston pa ni zhes bya ba ni grub mtha'o zhes bya ba rgyal ba can gyi'o //
analyzed: ston pa ni zhes bya ba ni grub mtha'o zhes bya ba rgyal ba can gyi'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe teacher‚Äù is the conclusion. ‚ÄúThe opponent‚Äôs‚Äù is the opponent‚Äôs.

original: 'dir ma yin no zhes bya ba phyi rol ma grub pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag gi'o //
analyzed: 'dir ma yin no zhes bya ba phyi rol ma grub pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag gi'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not here‚Äù is the nonestablishment of the external.

original: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa can rmi lam mthong ba ni de'i rnam pa skyed par byed pa mthong ba yin gyi rnam pa med pa'i nyid grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa can rmi lam mthong ba ni de'i rnam pa skyed par byed pa mthong ba yin gyi rnam pa med pa'i nyid grub pa ma yin te /
translated: The immediately preceding condition is the seeing of the various aspects of a dream. The seeing that produces those aspects is not established as being without aspects,

original: sems 'khrugs pa tsam 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni gang gi tshe zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sems 'khrugs pa tsam 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni gang gi tshe zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because the mere disturbance of the mind is the result. This is taught in ‚ÄúWhen‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: grub pa bzhin du don dang brtag par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: grub pa bzhin du don dang brtag par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not an object of investigation like an established thing.

original: 'bras bu la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni mthong ba'i zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni mthong ba'i zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Because there is no difference in the result, this is taught in ‚ÄúThe seen‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: 'bras bu'i khyad par ro /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i khyad par ro /
translated: The difference in the result.

original: ma mthong ba ni 'bras bu ma mthong ba'o //
analyzed: ma mthong ba ni 'bras bu ma mthong ba'o //
translated: The unseen is the unseen result.

original: thag ring ba la shing gi rnam pa ni shes pa yin te gsal ba'i don ni ma rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: thag ring ba la shing gi rnam pa ni shes pa yin te gsal ba'i don ni ma rtogs pa ste /
translated: The aspect of a tree is known in the distance, but the clear object is not understood.

original: ma rig pa bag chags ma gtogs par de yin te /
analyzed: ma rig pa bag chags ma gtogs par de yin te /
translated: That is ignorance, except for the latent tendencies.

original: des 'ga' nyams su myong ba yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa la gal te phyi'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des 'ga' nyams su myong ba yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa la gal te phyi'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: One might think that the eye sense faculty is the cause of the experience of some object.üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúif it were seen far away‚Äù is stated in response to that.

original: thag ring po na shes pa'i rnam pa mthong ba ni gang gi tshe gzhan du mthong ba de nyid mthong ba nyid yin gyi bag chags ma gtogs pa yin par bstan pa ni ma yin te der yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: thag ring po na shes pa'i rnam pa mthong ba ni gang gi tshe gzhan du mthong ba de nyid mthong ba nyid yin gyi bag chags ma gtogs pa yin par bstan pa ni ma yin te der yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: When one sees the aspect of consciousness far away, it is seen as it is, but it is not taught that it is seen as a latent impression.üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúin that case‚Äù is stated.

original: dpyod pa po dag gis de ltar shes kyi tha snyad byed pa po ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dpyod pa po dag gis de ltar shes kyi tha snyad byed pa po ni ma yin te /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe one who analyzes‚Äù is stated because the one who analyzes in that way is not the one who uses conventions.

original: dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa @181a * //
analyzed: dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa @181a * //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúbecause there is no purpose‚Äù is stated.

original: ni dpyad pa zhib mo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ni dpyad pa zhib mo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúsubtle analysis‚Äù is stated.üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúnon-realization‚Äù is stated because the one who analyzes in a coarse way does not analyze.

original: rtogs pa ma yin pa ni dpyad pa dman pa ste dpyod par mi byed pas de'i rnam pa la bdag gis sngon po mthong ngo zhes tha dad par rtog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa ma yin pa ni dpyad pa dman pa ste dpyod par mi byed pas de'i rnam pa la bdag gis sngon po mthong ngo zhes tha dad par rtog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase ‚ÄúI see blue‚Äù is stated because the aspect of that is conceived separately.

original: don yod na lhan cig byed pa rnams kyis sgro btags pa'i khyad par can nye bar len pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyud tha dad par byed pa ma yin te /üîΩrtag tu tshogs pa'i tshogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir bdag tu lta ba phyin ci log pa dang de dang rjes su mthun pa'i 'jug pa ni bdag 'di byed do zhes srog gcod pa la sogs pa mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu can ni /
analyzed: don yod na lhan cig byed pa rnams kyis sgro btags pa'i khyad par can nye bar len pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyud tha dad par byed pa ma yin te / rtag tu tshogs pa'i tshogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir bdag tu lta ba phyin ci log pa dang de dang rjes su mthun pa'i 'jug pa ni bdag 'di byed do zhes srog gcod pa la sogs pa mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu can ni /
translated: If the object exists, coemergent conditions do not create a different continuum of the appropriated result.üîΩThe view of self is mistaken and engagement that accords with it is like engaging in wrong consciousness, since it is not the cause of the desired result, such as killing and so on, thinking I do this.

original: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir log pa'i shes pa la 'jug pa bzhin du de la yang 'dod pa'i nga rgyal gyi gnas nyid 'thob pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir log pa'i shes pa la 'jug pa bzhin du de la yang 'dod pa'i nga rgyal gyi gnas nyid 'thob pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not a basis for the pride of desiring that result,

original: dbang po'i don tsam nye ba yin pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: dbang po'i don tsam nye ba yin pa'i phyir la /
translated: because the mere object of the sense faculties is present.

original: bdag med par lta ba phyin ci ma log pa dang de dang rjes su mthun pa'i sbyor ba la sogs pa 'dod pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa ni yang dag pa'i shes pa bzhin du 'dod pa 'thob par byed pa yin la /üîΩshes pa tsam du dbye ba med pa'i phyir dge ba dang cig shos kyi rnam par dbye ba med do snyam du sems pa ni gal te phyi rol gyi don zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bdag med par lta ba phyin ci ma log pa dang de dang rjes su mthun pa'i sbyor ba la sogs pa 'dod pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa ni yang dag pa'i shes pa bzhin du 'dod pa 'thob par byed pa yin la / shes pa tsam du dbye ba med pa'i phyir dge ba dang cig shos kyi rnam par dbye ba med do snyam du sems pa ni gal te phyi rol gyi don zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The correct view of selflessness and the practice that accords with it and so forth, which are endowed with the result of desire, are what cause one to obtain the result of desire, just like right knowledge.üîΩSince there is no distinction in mere knowledge, there is no distinction between virtue and the other.

original: rnam pa'i khyad par las nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i mi rigs te //
analyzed: rnam pa'i khyad par las nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i mi rigs te //
translated: If you think that, it is illogical to say that it is ascertained from the distinction of aspects.

original: ser po las kyang sngon po mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni phyi rol med na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ser po las kyang sngon po mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni phyi rol med na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because blue is also seen from yellow.

original: ser po ni phyi rol te phan tshun rgyu nyid la ni nges pa med do //
analyzed: ser po ni phyi rol te phan tshun rgyu nyid la ni nges pa med do //
translated: If external objects do not exist, yellow is external. There is no certainty in mutual causality.

original: lhan cig byed pa'i don ni sngon po'i snang ba las ser po dang lhan cig byed pa las ser por snang ba yin la /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa'i don ni sngon po'i snang ba las ser po dang lhan cig byed pa las ser por snang ba yin la /
translated: The meaning of co-arising is that yellow appears from the appearance of blue, co-arising with blue, appearing as yellow.

original: ser po'i snang ba las kyang sngon po dang lhan cig byed pas sngon po'i snang ba yin no //
analyzed: ser po'i snang ba las kyang sngon po dang lhan cig byed pas sngon po'i snang ba yin no //
translated: and the appearance of blue is due to the cooperation of the appearance of yellow.

original: de dag las nges pa med par gsal bar byed pa ni rnam par shes par smra bas ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dag las nges pa med par gsal bar byed pa ni rnam par shes par smra bas ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The assertion that the appearance is not determined by them is the opinion of the Vij√±ƒÅnavƒÅdin.

original: myu gur zhes bya ba ni skye ba'i dbang du byas pa'o //
analyzed: myu gur zhes bya ba ni skye ba'i dbang du byas pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúsprout‚Äù is used in the sense of origination.

original: ring du spangs pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu la sogs pa nyid med pa'i phyir dang / lkog tu gyur pa'i rjes su dpag par bya ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i khyad par las so //
analyzed: ring du spangs pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu la sogs pa nyid med pa'i phyir dang / lkog tu gyur pa'i rjes su dpag par bya ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i khyad par las so //
translated: ‚ÄúFar removed‚Äù means that the cause is not the effect, etc., and that the object to be inferred is not hidden.üîΩThe cause is distinguished by the special qualities that are imputed by the cooperating conditions.

original: lhan cig byed pa rnams kyis sgro btags pa'i khyad par can gyi rgyu dang 'byed par byed pa ni nye bar len pa ni phyi rol lam shes pa la yang khyad par med do //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa rnams kyis sgro btags pa'i khyad par can gyi rgyu dang 'byed par byed pa ni nye bar len pa ni phyi rol lam shes pa la yang khyad par med do //
translated: The appropriator is not distinguished from the external or the consciousness.

original: de bzhin du mi slu ba dang ldan pa ni tshad ma yin gyi cig shos ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du mi slu ba dang ldan pa ni tshad ma yin gyi cig shos ni ma yin no //
translated: Similarly, the valid cognition is that which is nondeceptive, and the other is not.

original: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa ni tha dad pa'i yin gyi rmongs pa dang cig shos las byung @181b ba'i rtogs pa tsam ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa ni tha dad pa'i yin gyi rmongs pa dang cig shos las byung @181b ba'i rtogs pa tsam ni ma yin te /
translated: A cognition with an image is different from a mere cognition that arises from delusion and its opposite.

original: bsod nams dang cig shos kyang ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba shin tu rnyed par sla ba yin par bstan pa ni sa bon las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsod nams dang cig shos kyang ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba shin tu rnyed par sla ba yin par bstan pa ni sa bon las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The distinction of merit and its opposite, etc., is very easily found. The statement that it is taught that it arises from a seed, etc.,

original: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa ni nges par byed pa yang yin la /
analyzed: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa ni nges par byed pa yang yin la /
translated: A cognition with an image is also a determiner.

original: gzhan yang sngon po'i bag chags kyis snying po can gyi ser po las kyang sngon po las snang ba nges pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang sngon po'i bag chags kyis snying po can gyi ser po las kyang sngon po las snang ba nges pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, a cognition with an image of blue is determined from a blue image, not from a yellow image, etc.üîΩAnd a determiner is like a cooperative condition in regard to an object.

original: sad par byed pa yang dmigs pa la lhan cig byed pa bzhin du dmigs pa kha cig la rmi lam du mthong ba yin te /
analyzed: sad par byed pa yang dmigs pa la lhan cig byed pa bzhin du dmigs pa kha cig la rmi lam du mthong ba yin te /
translated: And in a dream, one sees an object as if it were present, even though the object is absent.

original: gnyid sna tshogs pa yin yang bag chags sna tshogs pa sad pa las byung ba yin no //
analyzed: gnyid sna tshogs pa yin yang bag chags sna tshogs pa sad pa las byung ba yin no //
translated: And even though sleep is various, it arises from the awakening of various habitual tendencies.

original: phyi rol du smra ba yang 'di spong bar byed pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: phyi rol du smra ba yang 'di spong bar byed pa ma yin zhing /
translated: It is not that the externalist rejects this,

original: 'di la sems kyi gnas skabs kyi khyad par yang 'bras bu'i nus pa can gyi rigs pa med na nye bar mtshon par bla ba'i sad par byed pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di la sems kyi gnas skabs kyi khyad par yang 'bras bu'i nus pa can gyi rigs pa med na nye bar mtshon par bla ba'i sad par byed pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: but if there is no reasoning that has the power to produce an effect, even the difference in the state of the mind is not able to produce an indication. This is the meaning.

original: nges 'brel pa'i ni 'brel pa nges pa tsam gyi'o //
analyzed: nges 'brel pa'i ni 'brel pa nges pa tsam gyi'o //
translated: The definite connection is merely the definiteness of the connection.

original: phyi rol dang rnam par rig pa dag gi tshul mtshungs pa yin yang rnam par rig pa la yon tan ci yod na gang gis ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i phyi rol tshur brgyud nas 'ongs pa bsgoms nas de smra bar byed ces zer ba la snang ba
analyzed: phyi rol dang rnam par rig pa dag gi tshul mtshungs pa yin yang rnam par rig pa la yon tan ci yod na gang gis ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i phyi rol tshur brgyud nas 'ongs pa bsgoms nas de smra bar byed ces zer ba la snang ba
translated: Even though the mode of external things and consciousnesses is the same, what is the good of consciousness? By what is the external object, which comes from outside as one desires, imagined and spoken of?

original: nyid kyis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: nyid kyis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is said that it isüîΩby appearance itself.

original: rnam pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i shes pas so //
analyzed: rnam pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i shes pas so //
translated: By consciousness endowed with the distinction of aspect.

original: dgos pa ni grang ba med par byed pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dgos pa ni grang ba med par byed pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The purpose is to remove cold and so on.

original: snang ba'i rgyu snang bzhin pa ma yin pa'i dbang po la sogs pa yang yod pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la mi snang ba'i yod kyang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: snang ba'i rgyu snang bzhin pa ma yin pa'i dbang po la sogs pa yang yod pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la mi snang ba'i yod kyang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: But is there not also an existent sense faculty, etc., which is not appearing, like the cause of the appearance?

original: de yang mthong ba'i bag chags ma gtogs pa tshad ma'i yul ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de yang mthong ba'i bag chags ma gtogs pa tshad ma'i yul ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that even though it is not an object of valid cognition, except for the latent impressions of seeing.

original: dmigs pa nyid ces bya ba ni rgyu dang rgyu can gyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: dmigs pa nyid ces bya ba ni rgyu dang rgyu can gyi bdag nyid do //
translated: The very object of perception is the nature of the cause and the caused.

original: rgyu ni bag chags yin la des na phyi rol med kyang de nges pa yin par bstan pa ni phyi'i don no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu ni bag chags yin la des na phyi rol med kyang de nges pa yin par bstan pa ni phyi'i don no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The cause is the latent impression. Therefore, even without external objects, it is ascertained. This is indicated by the word external object.

original: de yang phyi rol du ba med na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de yang phyi rol du ba med na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: And that is also external.üîΩIf there is no external object, it would not occur.

original: 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bag chags kyi nges pa las so //
analyzed: 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bag chags kyi nges pa las so //
translated: This is from the certainty of the latent impressions.

original: phyi rol snang bzhin pa ma yin pa yang 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: phyi rol snang bzhin pa ma yin pa yang 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba yang mi rigs te /
translated: It is also not correct to say that there is no contradiction in the non-appearance of the external object.

original: med pa nyid du 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa khyad par yin par bstan pa ni //
analyzed: med pa nyid du 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa khyad par yin par bstan pa ni //
translated: The contradiction of non-existence, etc., is indicated by the special words.

original: gal te don de su la yang //
analyzed: gal te don de su la yang //
translated: If that object does not exist for anyone,

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is not an object of knowledge.

original: grub na zhes bya ba ni ma dmigs bzhin pa'i gnas skabs na yang 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par yod pa'i phyir ro //üîΩkha cig tu ma dmigs @182a * //
analyzed: grub na zhes bya ba ni ma dmigs bzhin pa'i gnas skabs na yang 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par yod pa'i phyir ro // kha cig tu ma dmigs @182a * //
translated: If it is established, then even in the state of non-apprehension, there is a distinction such as being an effect.

original: pa de dmigs na dmigs bzhin pa de'i 'bras bu yin pas rnam par rtog pa de ma yin pa las log pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir khyab pa yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te gcig nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: pa de dmigs na dmigs bzhin pa de'i 'bras bu yin pas rnam par rtog pa de ma yin pa las log pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir khyab pa yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te gcig nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Some say that when that non-apprehension is apprehended, it is the effect of that apprehension, and that the pervasion is because it has an object that is the opposite of non-apprehension. But if it is the same as that, then it is not the opposite of non-apprehension.

original: kun rdzob tu ni de ma yin pa las log pas so //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu ni de ma yin pa las log pas so //
translated: It is not so conventionally, because it is the opposite of non-apprehension.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni rgyud gzhan las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni rgyud gzhan las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Other means arising from another continuum.

original: 'di ni mtshungs so zhes bya ba ni de las gzhan gyis dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni mtshungs so zhes bya ba ni de las gzhan gyis dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is similar, means because it is apprehended by something else.

original: rang la snang du rung pa dang cig shos la snang du rung ba dag gcig pa nyid du sgro 'dogs par ni phyi rol du smra ba dang cig shos la mtshungs pa yin par bstan pa ni rnam par shes pa snang ba la yang zhes bya pa'o //
analyzed: rang la snang du rung pa dang cig shos la snang du rung ba dag gcig pa nyid du sgro 'dogs par ni phyi rol du smra ba dang cig shos la mtshungs pa yin par bstan pa ni rnam par shes pa snang ba la yang zhes bya pa'o //
translated: It is taught that the externalist and the Vij√±aptivƒÅdin are the same in that they superimpose identity on what is capable of appearing to oneself and what is capable of appearing to the other.

original: myu gu snang ba la phyi rol bzhin du sa bon mi snang ba ni sgro btags pas rgyu yin no zhes nye bar sdud pa ni des na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: myu gu snang ba la phyi rol bzhin du sa bon mi snang ba ni sgro btags pas rgyu yin no zhes nye bar sdud pa ni des na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The seed does not appear in the appearance of the sprout, like the external seed, because of superimposition. This is the summary.

original: de'i ngo bo yang yin la nges pa yang yin zhing /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo yang yin la nges pa yang yin zhing /
translated: It is the nature of that, and it is also the ascertainment.

original: de dag snang ba yang yin la /
analyzed: de dag snang ba yang yin la /
translated: It is the appearance of those,

original: 'brel pa yang yin pa de dag go rims bzhin du gang gi yin pa de dag go //
analyzed: 'brel pa yang yin pa de dag go rims bzhin du gang gi yin pa de dag go //
translated: and it is also the connection. Those are in order.

original: 'khrul pas gzung ba'i myu gu'i snang ba ni phyi rol gyis bon du snang ba'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pas gzung ba'i myu gu'i snang ba ni phyi rol gyis bon du snang ba'o //
translated: The appearance of the sprout that is grasped by error is the appearance of the external seed.

original: rnam par 'jog par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par 'jog par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not the determiner,

original: bag chags tsam las byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bag chags tsam las byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because it arises from mere latent tendencies. This is the meaning.

original: gzhan snang ba la mi slu ba can gyi rjes su dpag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan snang ba la mi slu ba can gyi rjes su dpag pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not an inference that is nondeceptive with regard to what appears to others.

original: rang nyid don byed pa'i nyams su mong ba la de ltar brjod pa'i phyir ma yin nam zhes zer ba la gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang nyid don byed pa'i nyams su mong ba la de ltar brjod pa'i phyir ma yin nam zhes zer ba la gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Is it not said that it is so with regard to the experience of one‚Äôs own object?

original: phyi rol gyi rjes su dpag pa la yang snang ba mi slu ba yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi rjes su dpag pa la yang snang ba mi slu ba yin te /
translated: In the case of external inference, it is nondeceptive with regard to what appears.

original: 'jug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i lan ni rnam par shes pa snang ba la yang mtshungs te /
analyzed: 'jug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i lan ni rnam par shes pa snang ba la yang mtshungs te /
translated: The response to the objection that it would follow that there would be no engagement is the same for the appearance of consciousness.

original: gzhan gyi snang ba'i sems pa can gyi rjes su dpag pa la gnod pa med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan gyi snang ba'i sems pa can gyi rjes su dpag pa la gnod pa med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: There is no fault in the inference of one who has a mind that is the appearance of another.

original: 'gyur na zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa la'o //
analyzed: 'gyur na zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf it changes‚Äù refers to inference.

original: phyi nas nyid ni mi slu ba'i dus nyid la'o //
analyzed: phyi nas nyid ni mi slu ba'i dus nyid la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúLater‚Äù refers to the time of nondeception.

original: sngar zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa'i dus na'o //
analyzed: sngar zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa'i dus na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúPreviously‚Äù refers to the time of inference.

original: rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba ni mi slu ba'i dus kyi'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba ni mi slu ba'i dus kyi'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn every way‚Äù refers to the time of nondeception.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: ‚ÄúAlways‚Äù is a particular realization.

original: gcig ni mi slu ba'i dang mtshungs pa'i rnam pa gang gi yin pa de'o //
analyzed: gcig ni mi slu ba'i dang mtshungs pa'i rnam pa gang gi yin pa de'o //
translated: One is the aspect of non-deception, which is the other nature.

original: gzhan gyi ngo bo ni don dam pa'i ngo bos sam spyi'i rnam pas so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ngo bo ni don dam pa'i ngo bos sam spyi'i rnam pas so //
translated: The other nature is by way of the ultimate nature or by way of the aspect of the universal.

original: der ni phyi rol du'o //
analyzed: der ni phyi rol du'o //
translated: There is external.

original: des ci zhig bya zhes bya ba ni dgos pa can gyi ngo bo med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des ci zhig bya zhes bya ba ni dgos pa can gyi ngo bo med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: What is the use of that? Because there is no nature that is needed.

original: de med na zhes bya ba ni rtog pas sgro btags pa'i phyi rol med na'o //
analyzed: de med na zhes bya ba ni rtog pas sgro btags pa'i phyi rol med na'o //
translated: If that does not exist, if external is not imputed by thought,

original: rnam par chad pa skyes zhes bya ba ni mi @182b slu pa'i dus tsam la yod pas so //
analyzed: rnam par chad pa skyes zhes bya ba ni mi @182b slu pa'i dus tsam la yod pas so //
translated: ‚Äúarisen as a division‚Äù is because it exists at the time of non-deception.

original: de zhes bya ba ni sngar ro //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni sngar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù is the previous.

original: nus pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni snang ba med pas gcig mthong bar mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: nus pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni snang ba med pas gcig mthong bar mtshungs pa'o //
translated: It is not possible, because of the absence of appearance, the same as seeing one.

original: mi slu ba la rgya skyegs 'bras bu la yod pa'i tshon gyis so //
analyzed: mi slu ba la rgya skyegs 'bras bu la yod pa'i tshon gyis so //
translated: In non-deception, the color of the fruit of the lac tree.

original: rnam shes tshogs ni rim gyis 'byung ba'i skad cig ma rnams bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: rnam shes tshogs ni rim gyis 'byung ba'i skad cig ma rnams bsdus pa'o //
translated: The collection of consciousnesses is the collection of the moments that arise in sequence.

original: de'i bag chags ni shes pa snga ma'i bag chags so //
analyzed: de'i bag chags ni shes pa snga ma'i bag chags so //
translated: The latent impression of that is the latent impression of the prior cognition.

original: nges pa ni shes pa'o //
analyzed: nges pa ni shes pa'o //
translated: The ascertainment is the cognition.

original: phyi rol la tshad ma med pa'i phyir mer snang las te rjes su dpag pa las so zhes bya ba ni dpe yin no //üîΩdpe can la ni des de'am zhes brjod pa yin la rnam par shes pa'i tshul la 'di gnyis la zhes bya ba'i phyi rol dang cig shos dag la'o //üîΩdu ba mes skyed 'gyur ba min //üîΩzhes bya ba ni bag chags nyid las byung ba'i phyir ro //üîΩme'i snang ba ni de'i bag chags sad par byed pa nyid kyi rgyu nyid yin pa ni du ba la yang yin te /üîΩdes kyang de sad par byed pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde'i phyir de las rjes su dpag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol la tshad ma med pa'i phyir mer snang las te rjes su dpag pa las so zhes bya ba ni dpe yin no // dpe can la ni des de'am zhes brjod pa yin la rnam par shes pa'i tshul la 'di gnyis la zhes bya ba'i phyi rol dang cig shos dag la'o // du ba mes skyed 'gyur ba min // zhes bya ba ni bag chags nyid las byung ba'i phyir ro // me'i snang ba ni de'i bag chags sad par byed pa nyid kyi rgyu nyid yin pa ni du ba la yang yin te / des kyang de sad par byed pa'i phyir ro // de'i phyir de las rjes su dpag pa ma yin te /
translated: Because there is no valid cognition in regard to external things, it is from the appearance of fire, i.e., from inference. This is the example.

original: 'khrul pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni rgyu dag ni yin na yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni rgyu dag ni yin na yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In the case of the example, it is said, ‚Äúfrom that, that,‚Äù i.e., from the appearance of smoke, the ascertainment of fire. original: du ba ni me'i bag chags dang bcas pa'i rang gi bag chags las byung ba yin la /
analyzed: du ba ni me'i bag chags dang bcas pa'i rang gi bag chags las byung ba yin la /
translated: Smoke arises from its own latent impressions along with the latent impressions of fire.

original: de gnyi ga de ltar sad pa yin par go bar byed pa yin la /
analyzed: de gnyi ga de ltar sad pa yin par go bar byed pa yin la /
translated: And both of them are understood to be awakened in that way.

original: tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa las mer snang ba yang ngo //
analyzed: tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa las mer snang ba yang ngo //
translated: And the appearance as fire in one assemblage is dependent on that.

original: gang gi de sad pa yin na de'i 'bras bu med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi de sad pa yin na de'i 'bras bu med pa ma yin te /
translated: When that is awakened, its effect is not nonexistent,üîΩbecause its very existence is expressed as awakening.

original: de'i dngos po nyid sad par byed pa nyid du brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni de la'ang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i dngos po nyid sad par byed pa nyid du brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni de la'ang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúthat‚Äù refers to that.

original: sad pas gsal ba'i bag chags gang gi yin pa de'o //
analyzed: sad pas gsal ba'i bag chags gang gi yin pa de'o //
translated: That which has the latent impressions of the clear appearance of awakening.

original: de lta bu'i gsal ba nyid du bar snang ba'i rgyu'i lhan cig byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ma sad pa ni lhan cig byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de lta bu'i gsal ba nyid du bar snang ba'i rgyu'i lhan cig byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ma sad pa ni lhan cig byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that because it is the co-operating cause of the appearance as such clear appearance, the non-awakened is not a co-operating cause.

original: rtogs 'gyur zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za bar yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs 'gyur zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za bar yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúOne would understand‚Äù means because it definitely exists.

original: me bzhin yin pa ni skyed pas na zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: me bzhin yin pa ni skyed pas na zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúLike fire‚Äù is connected with ‚Äúbecause it produces.‚Äù

original: du ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i me dag gi snang ba dag ste de'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: du ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i me dag gi snang ba dag ste de'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The appearances of smoke and the fire that will occur are its essence.

original: lkog tu gyur pa ni rjes su dpag par bya ba'o //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa ni rjes su dpag par bya ba'o //
translated: The hidden is what is to be inferred.

original: ma gyur pa ni mi slu bar rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: ma gyur pa ni mi slu bar rtogs pa'o //
translated: The non-occurrence is the non-deceptive realization.

original: bag chags kyi dbang nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni gcig pa nyid du 'dzin pa'i sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa de'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir da ltar ba'i snang ba gzhan la gnas pa'i rjes su dpag pa la 'gal ba med par bstan nas /
analyzed: bag chags kyi dbang nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni gcig pa nyid du 'dzin pa'i sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa de'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir da ltar ba'i snang ba gzhan la gnas pa'i rjes su dpag pa la 'gal ba med par bstan nas /
translated: By the power of habitual tendencies means that because the prior perception of the apprehension of sameness is the essence of recognition, it is taught that there is no contradiction in inferring the present appearance that exists elsewhere.

original: rang nyid kyi 'byung bar 'gyur ba la yang bstan pa ni phyi'i don la yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang nyid kyi 'byung bar 'gyur ba la yang bstan pa ni phyi'i don la yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Having taught that, he also teaches about one's own future: Even with external objects means that.

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni me ma yin pa la 'jug pa'i rgyud rjes su dpag par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni me ma yin pa la 'jug pa'i rgyud rjes su dpag par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Just as means that because the continuum that engages with what is not fire is to be inferred, it is taught that there is no contradiction in inferring the future appearance that exists elsewhere.

original: goms pa'i yul can gyis bsgrub @183a * //
analyzed: goms pa'i yul can gyis bsgrub @183a * //
translated: The object of familiarity is established.

original: pa'i 'bras bu'i cha la btang snyoms su 'jig pa bzhin du dgongs pa'i mthar thug pa yin par bstan pa ni de lta bu nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: pa'i 'bras bu'i cha la btang snyoms su 'jig pa bzhin du dgongs pa'i mthar thug pa yin par bstan pa ni de lta bu nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The ultimate intention is shown in the phrase ‚Äúin that way.‚Äù

original: rgyud la yang 'das pa la sogs pa'i cha phrad par ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyud la yang 'das pa la sogs pa'i cha phrad par ma yin te /
translated: In a continuum, the past and so on are not in contact with each other.

original: cha rnams ni rgyud du brjod par bya ba yin no zhes bstan pa ni mthong phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: cha rnams ni rgyud du brjod par bya ba yin no zhes bstan pa ni mthong phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The expression ‚Äúcontinuum‚Äù is used for the parts, as is shown in the phrase ‚Äúbecause of seeing.‚Äù

original: phyi rol nyid dgos pa can ma yin par bstan pa ni phyi don la ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyi rol nyid dgos pa can ma yin par bstan pa ni phyi don la ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The external is not the purpose is shown in the phrase ‚Äúwith regard to external objects.‚Äù

original: shin tu nges zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir gcig nyid du zhen pas 'jug pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shin tu nges zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir gcig nyid du zhen pas 'jug pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúVery definite‚Äù means that because it is the object of engagement, it is engaged in by the conception of singularity, and so it would become the very thing that arises.

original: ci las shen rig pas zhes bya ba smos te thob pa'i yul ni rig pa'i yul yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ci las shen rig pas zhes bya ba smos te thob pa'i yul ni rig pa'i yul yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: From what? The phrase ‚Äúby means of reasoning‚Äù is used. The object of attainment is the object of reasoning, is the meaning.

original: da ltar ba'i don gyi yul can zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni g-yo 'gul byed pa las brtsams nas 'bras bu dang phrad pa'i bar du gcig pa nyid du zhen pas mngon sum yin par blta bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: da ltar ba'i don gyi yul can zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni g-yo 'gul byed pa las brtsams nas 'bras bu dang phrad pa'i bar du gcig pa nyid du zhen pas mngon sum yin par blta bar bya ba'o //
translated: The present object-possessor, etc. is seen as direct perception because of the adherence to sameness from the beginning of movement up to the attainment of the effect.

original: bag chags ni rtogs par bya ba yin pas de'i bskyed bya'i snang ba la gcig par zhen pas mer snang ba'i blo nyid ni rtogs 'gyur zhes bya bas bstan zin par bstan pa ni bag chags de yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bag chags ni rtogs par bya ba yin pas de'i bskyed bya'i snang ba la gcig par zhen pas mer snang ba'i blo nyid ni rtogs 'gyur zhes bya bas bstan zin par bstan pa ni bag chags de yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Since the appearance that is produced from the latent impressions is adhered to as being the same, the cognition that appears as fire is taught as being a realization. The latent impression of that is also taught as being a realization.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i me bzhin no zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba dang gcig nyid du zhen pa na'o //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i me bzhin no zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba dang gcig nyid du zhen pa na'o //
translated: It is like the fire that will occur, when there is adherence to sameness with the present.

original: phyi rol gyis byas pa'i snang ba la dad pa'i yul can nyid ni rnam par shes pa'i tshul la mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhes zer ba ni 'jig rten don nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyis byas pa'i snang ba la dad pa'i yul can nyid ni rnam par shes pa'i tshul la mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhes zer ba ni 'jig rten don nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: Is it not the case that the object-possessor that believes in the appearance produced by external things is not in accord with the mode of consciousness? This is the meaning of the world.

original: snang ba nyams par mi byed pa ni bag chags brtan po khyad par du byed pa yod na shugs kyis phyi rol thob par 'gyur ba ma yin par bstan pa ni gal te bag chags brtan pa brten nas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snang ba nyams par mi byed pa ni bag chags brtan po khyad par du byed pa yod na shugs kyis phyi rol thob par 'gyur ba ma yin par bstan pa ni gal te bag chags brtan pa brten nas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The non-deficiency of appearance is taught to be not the attainment of the external by force, if there is a special stable latent impression.

original: mtshams sbyor ldan na zhes bya ba ni nyams pa can ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: mtshams sbyor ldan na zhes bya ba ni nyams pa can ma yin pa'o //
translated: If there is a connection, means if there is no deficiency.

original: yin yang zhes bya ba bshad pa ni /
analyzed: yin yang zhes bya ba bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of ‚Äúeven though‚Äù is

original: rmi lam gyi khyad par nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: rmi lam gyi khyad par nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúthe difference of dream.‚Äù

original: 'jug pa med par thal ba ni thal bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa med par thal ba ni thal bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The consequence of non-engagement is the consequence of the non-engagement of the mind.

original: du ba'i snang ba'i blo ni rang gi bag chags de'i bskyed bya rtogs par byed pa yin gyi de'i snang ba'i mthar thug pa'i me'i bag chags ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni gal te me la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: du ba'i snang ba'i blo ni rang gi bag chags de'i bskyed bya rtogs par byed pa yin gyi de'i snang ba'i mthar thug pa'i me'i bag chags ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni gal te me la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The idea is that the cognition of the appearance of smoke is the revealer of the product of its own latent impression, but not the latent impression of fire which is the ultimate appearance of that.

original: rang gi bag chags bzhin du me'i bag chags kyang grogs byas nas du ba'i blo bskyed pa yin par bstan pa ni sems rgyud de rung zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi bag chags bzhin du me'i bag chags kyang grogs byas nas du ba'i blo bskyed pa yin par bstan pa ni sems rgyud de rung zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that the latent potentialities of fire, like one's own latent potentialities, assist and generate the idea of smoke is the statement that the mental continuum is suitable.

original: me'i snang ba la rung ba'i @183b bag chags snying po ste /
analyzed: me'i snang ba la rung ba'i @183b bag chags snying po ste /
translated: The essence of the latent potentialities of fire is suitable for the appearance of fire.

The statement that the mental continuum is suitable for the appearance of smoke is the statement that the mental continuum is suitable for the appearance of smoke.üîΩThe statement that the mental continuum is suitable for the appearance of smoke is the statement that the mental continuum is suitable for the appearance of smoke.
