original: du ba'i bag chags grogs yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rim pa'o //
analyzed: du ba'i bag chags grogs yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rim pa'o //
translated: The statement that the mental continuum is suitable for the appearance of smoke is the statement that the mental continuum is suitable for the appearance of smoke.üîΩThe statement that the mental continuum is suitable for the appearance of

original: me snang ba'i blo nyid ni rtogs 'gyur zhes gsungs pas ma 'ongs pa'i yul nyid du gsungs pa yin par bstan pa ni thams cad du ni ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: me snang ba'i blo nyid ni rtogs 'gyur zhes gsungs pas ma 'ongs pa'i yul nyid du gsungs pa yin par bstan pa ni thams cad du ni ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In all cases, the future is taught.

original: du ba las zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi tshul la yang ngo //
analyzed: du ba las zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi tshul la yang ngo //
translated: From smoke, in the external mode.

original: 'di'i snang ba ni rab rib can gyis mthong ba las khyad par byed de don gyi dbye ba med do zhes bstan pa ni de'i dus su zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di'i snang ba ni rab rib can gyis mthong ba las khyad par byed de don gyi dbye ba med do zhes bstan pa ni de'i dus su zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The appearance of this is distinguished from what is seen by one with cataracts, and there is no difference in the object. This is shown by at that time.

original: phyi rol la yang rang gi dus na shes pa la med pa dang khyad par med pa na bstan pa ni ji ltar tshad ma nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyi rol la yang rang gi dus na shes pa la med pa dang khyad par med pa na bstan pa ni ji ltar tshad ma nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: In the external, also, there is no difference in the cognition at its own time. This is shown by how can it be valid cognition?

original: gnya' bo'i tshul gyis te 'jal gnya' lta bu'o //
analyzed: gnya' bo'i tshul gyis te 'jal gnya' lta bu'o //
translated: Like a yoke, like a yoke-bearing animal.

original: bag chags tsam gyis go bya ni bag chags tsam las 'byung ba'i me'i shes pa'i go byed nyid yin pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bo mngon sum gyis rtogs pa yin la rang gi ngo bo'i rtogs pa yang bag chags nyid las yin te /
analyzed: bag chags tsam gyis go bya ni bag chags tsam las 'byung ba'i me'i shes pa'i go byed nyid yin pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bo mngon sum gyis rtogs pa yin la rang gi ngo bo'i rtogs pa yang bag chags nyid las yin te /
translated: The object of understanding is the understanding of the cognition of fire that arises from mere latent impressions, because it is the understanding of its own nature by perception. And the understanding of its own nature is from latent impressions themselves.

original: rmi lam lta bu'i zhes bstan pa ni bag chags kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rmi lam lta bu'i zhes bstan pa ni bag chags kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement ‚Äúlike a dream‚Äù is about latent impressions.

original: rigs so zhes bya ba ni phyi rol la tshad ma med pa'i phyir snang ba gzhan nyid bag chags nyid kyis mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs so zhes bya ba ni phyi rol la tshad ma med pa'i phyir snang ba gzhan nyid bag chags nyid kyis mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚Äú It is reasonable‚Äù because there is no valid cognition in regard to external objects, and because the appearance itself is perception due to latent impressions.

original: gnod par byed pa'i snang du rung bar byed pa'i bag chags dang 'brel pa can gyi sems kyi rgyud kyi bskyed bya du ba'i blo yin no zhes bya bas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i me'i blo'i bskyed bya nyid bstan to //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa'i snang du rung bar byed pa'i bag chags dang 'brel pa can gyi sems kyi rgyud kyi bskyed bya du ba'i blo yin no zhes bya bas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i me'i blo'i bskyed bya nyid bstan to //
translated: The cognition of smoke that is produced by a mind that is connected with latent impressions that are capable of producing the appearance of impairment is the cognition of fire that will occur. This is what is taught.

original: de nyid kyi phyir thob par bya ba'i blo'i bskyed bya nyid mngon sum gyi rang gi ngo bo bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir thob par bya ba'i blo'i bskyed bya nyid mngon sum gyi rang gi ngo bo bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the nature of direct perception is taught to be the object of the mind that is to be attained.üîΩBut how?

original: 'o na ji ltar zhes bya ba ni nges pa yang shes pa'i rnam pa'i yul nyid kyis phyi rol du med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar zhes bya ba ni nges pa yang shes pa'i rnam pa'i yul nyid kyis phyi rol du med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even ascertainment is not external, because it is the object of the aspect of consciousness.

original: bden te phyi rol mthong ba nyid la mkhas pas rig pa la mi mkhas pa dag phyi rol du mngon par rlom par byed cing de ltar mngon pa 'dod pa yang de rjes su gzung ba'i ched du khas blang pa kho nas shes pa'i rnam pa @184a *
analyzed: bden te phyi rol mthong ba nyid la mkhas pas rig pa la mi mkhas pa dag phyi rol du mngon par rlom par byed cing de ltar mngon pa 'dod pa yang de rjes su gzung ba'i ched du khas blang pa kho nas shes pa'i rnam pa @184a *
translated: It is true that the wise know that seeing is external, but the unwise imagine it to be external. In order to guide those who desire to know in that way, the aspect of consciousness is taught to be the object of expression by mere assertion.

original: // nyed brjod bya yin par bstan pa ni mkhas pa rnams la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: // nyed brjod bya yin par bstan pa ni mkhas pa rnams la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The wise know that the aspect of consciousness is the object of expression.

original: lhan cig ni de'i bdag nyid du mthong ba de myong pa yang nyams su myong ba'i nges pas so //
analyzed: lhan cig ni de'i bdag nyid du mthong ba de myong pa yang nyams su myong ba'i nges pas so //
translated: Together means that seeing is experienced as the nature of that experience.

original: de yang ni tshul gnyis nyid de rang gi rig pa dang sngon po la sogs pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de yang ni tshul gnyis nyid de rang gi rig pa dang sngon po la sogs pa nyid kyis so //
translated: And that is twofold: by its own awareness and by blue, etc.

original: tha mi dad par nyams su myong ba'i lcags ni me bzhin du rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pas tha dad pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni 'dzin pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha mi dad par nyams su myong ba'i lcags ni me bzhin du rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pas tha dad pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni 'dzin pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that it is only different, because of the conformity, etc., of the experience, like the heat of iron, is ‚Äúbecause of the apprehension.‚Äù

original: de nyid dang zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid dang zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy that‚Äù is by the form of awareness.

original: tha dad par nyams su myong ba yang bde ba la sogs pa ma yin par bstan pa ni tha dad pa la yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha dad par nyams su myong ba yang bde ba la sogs pa ma yin par bstan pa ni tha dad pa la yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that the experience is not of pleasure, etc., even though it is different, is ‚Äúeven though different.‚Äù

original: dus tha dad pa la yang rnam pa tha mi dad pas gcig par rig pa ma yin par bstan pa ni de nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: dus tha dad pa la yang rnam pa tha mi dad pas gcig par rig pa ma yin par bstan pa ni de nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that it is not known as one because of the difference in time, even though there is no difference in form, is ‚Äúby that.‚Äù

original: mngon sum ni de ma yin pa las ldog par byed pa 'dzin pa yin te //
analyzed: mngon sum ni de ma yin pa las ldog par byed pa 'dzin pa yin te //
translated: Direct perception is the apprehension that excludes what is not that.

original: de la mchog tu 'dzin pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir 'brel par 'dzin par byed pa yin gyi 'di ma yin pa'i yul la sogs pa 'dzin par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: de la mchog tu 'dzin pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir 'brel par 'dzin par byed pa yin gyi 'di ma yin pa'i yul la sogs pa 'dzin par byed pa ma yin /
translated: Because it generates the apprehension of that as supreme, it apprehends the object as related, but not as this or that.

original: par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not taught that it is the apprehender of the object as one.

original: spyi'i yul can yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: spyi'i yul can yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Because it has a universal as its object.

original: de ma yin pa las log pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir gcig nyid kho na yul la sogs pa'i dbye ba can ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de ma yin pa las log pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir gcig nyid kho na yul la sogs pa'i dbye ba can ma yin pa'o //
translated: Because it has an object that is the opposite of that which is not that, it is not one alone that has the divisions of object and so on.

original: de bzhin du sngon po ma yin pa dang rig pa ma yin pa las log par 'dzin pa dang / de la mchog tu 'dzin pa dag gis tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa dag go //
analyzed: de bzhin du sngon po ma yin pa dang rig pa ma yin pa las log par 'dzin pa dang / de la mchog tu 'dzin pa dag gis tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa dag go //
translated: In the same way, it is different and not different from the apprehension of the opposite of not blue and not cognition, and from the apprehension of that as supreme.

original: rtogs pa'i rang bzhin dang zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang sngon po dag rig pa gcig gi bdag nyid kyi khongs su gtogs pa dag go //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i rang bzhin dang zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang sngon po dag rig pa gcig gi bdag nyid kyi khongs su gtogs pa dag go //
translated: The nature of realization is the inclusion of pleasure and blue in the nature of a single cognition.

original: spyir zhes bya ba ni 'di lta bur gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gsum pa'o //
analyzed: spyir zhes bya ba ni 'di lta bur gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gsum pa'o //
translated: In general means the third with the characteristic of being like this.

original: lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa nyid ni rang rig pa gcig gi byed pa la rjes su zhugs pa nyid do //
analyzed: lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa nyid ni rang rig pa gcig gi byed pa la rjes su zhugs pa nyid do //
translated: The certainty of simultaneous observation is the engagement in the activity of a single self-awareness.

original: don gyi dbye bas dbye ba med pa bzhin du rnam pa med pa nyid kyis dbang po tha dad pa las kyang tha dad par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: don gyi dbye bas dbye ba med pa bzhin du rnam pa med pa nyid kyis dbang po tha dad pa las kyang tha dad par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Just as there is no division due to the division of objects, there is also no difference due to the difference of sense faculties, because of the absence of aspects.

original: 'di rnam pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni gang gi tshe zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di rnam pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni gang gi tshe zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is taught by ‚Äúwhen.‚Äù

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni gsal ba dang mi gsal ba dang bsres pa la sogs pa yang ngo //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni gsal ba dang mi gsal ba dang bsres pa la sogs pa yang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúMoreover‚Äù means also mixed with the manifest and unmanifest, and so on.

original: dbang po 'gyur pas byas pa'i 'gyur ba'i rnam pa can gyi shes bya ni nyams su myong ba'i yul can yin par bstan pa ni dbang po'i khyad par zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dbang po 'gyur pas byas pa'i 'gyur ba'i rnam pa can gyi shes bya ni nyams su myong ba'i yul can yin par bstan pa ni dbang po'i khyad par zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The object of cognition that has the aspect of being produced by the change of the sense faculty is taught to be the object of experience. ‚ÄúThe difference of sense faculties‚Äù means

original: rnam pa ni de lta bu'i dbye ba can yin gyi rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa ni de lta bu'i dbye ba can yin gyi rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: the aspect is of that kind of division, but not the cognition,

original: khyad par @184b med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyad par @184b med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because there is no difference. This is the meaning.

original: don la yang de ltar tha dad pa med de dbye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don la yang de ltar tha dad pa med de dbye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In fact, there is no such difference, because there is no division.

original: tha dad na yang shes pa thams cad la de lta bur snang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: tha dad na yang shes pa thams cad la de lta bur snang bar 'gyur te /
translated: If there were a difference, then all consciousnesses would appear in that way,

original: ngo bo de res 'ga' ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni don gyi zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ngo bo de res 'ga' ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni don gyi zhes bya ba ste /
translated: because that nature is not sometimes present and sometimes not.

original: rnam pa ni 'bras bu yin te ji srid pa po'i 'dres pa la sogs pas tha dad par 'gyur gyi don ni ma yin te rtogs bya yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam pa ni 'bras bu yin te ji srid pa po'i 'dres pa la sogs pas tha dad par 'gyur gyi don ni ma yin te rtogs bya yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the statement is that the aspect is the effect, because it is different due to the mixture of the object and so on, but the object is not, because it is the object of comprehension.

original: de ni shes pa'i don las der snang ba nyid ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de ni shes pa'i don las der snang ba nyid ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: It is not that the object is not the appearance of that in consciousness.

original: rung ba'i yul nyid du khyad par med pas cha bzhin du cha gzhan la yang shes pa de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: rung ba'i yul nyid du khyad par med pas cha bzhin du cha gzhan la yang shes pa de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: Since there is no difference in being a suitable object, like the parts, the other parts would also have that nature of consciousness.

original: dbang po'i rnam par 'gyur ba'i bag chags rnams kyang 'dzin pa'i nges pa can nyid ma yin na /
analyzed: dbang po'i rnam par 'gyur ba'i bag chags rnams kyang 'dzin pa'i nges pa can nyid ma yin na /
translated: If the latent potentialities of the transformation of the sense faculties do not definitely hold the aspect,

original: don nyid de las de'i tshe skye ba ni shes pa bzhin yin te /
analyzed: don nyid de las de'i tshe skye ba ni shes pa bzhin yin te /
translated: The meaning is that at that time, the arising of the object is like the arising of consciousness.

original: sngar yod pa la tshad ma med pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: sngar yod pa la tshad ma med pa'i phyir ram /
translated: Because there is no valid cognition of an object that exists prior to its perception,

original: mi 'dzin pa nyid du snang ba'i phyir yang shes pa'i bdag nyid kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi 'dzin pa nyid du snang ba'i phyir yang shes pa'i bdag nyid kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: or because the object is not perceived, it is the nature of consciousness.üîΩIt is not reasonable that a single aspect of an object should have various co-operating conditions such as the sense faculty, etc., and yet be a single consciousness with the same aspect.

original: don gyi rnam pa gcig las de dang rnam pa gcig pa'i shes pa ni dbang po la sogs pa'i dbye ba sna tshogs pa'i lhan cig byed pa can sna tshogs par ni mi rigs so zhes bstan pa ni don la brten nas so zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don gyi rnam pa gcig las de dang rnam pa gcig pa'i shes pa ni dbang po la sogs pa'i dbye ba sna tshogs pa'i lhan cig byed pa can sna tshogs par ni mi rigs so zhes bstan pa ni don la brten nas so zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBased on the object‚Äù shows this.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni de'i rnam pa can gyi'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni de'i rnam pa can gyi'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the aspect of that object.

original: 'ga' yis zhes bya ba ni bsres pa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: 'ga' yis zhes bya ba ni bsres pa la sogs pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy some‚Äù refers to mixing, etc.

original: gzhan las kyang zhes bya ba ni dbang po la sogs pas kyang ngo //
analyzed: gzhan las kyang zhes bya ba ni dbang po la sogs pas kyang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom others‚Äù refers to the sense faculty, etc.

original: skye bar 'gyur ba yod na gzhan las kyang ste dbang po la sogs pas kyang ngo //
analyzed: skye bar 'gyur ba yod na gzhan las kyang ste dbang po la sogs pas kyang ngo //
translated: If arising exists, it is also from others, i.e., from the sense faculty, etc.

original: de'i rnam pa nyid ni bsres pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa nyid ni bsres pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa nyid do //
translated: Its aspect is the aspect of a mixture, etc.

original: rnam pa'am shes pa nyid kyang de las de'i ngo bo yin la gzhan las ni gzhan gyi rnam pa can yin no zhes bya ba 'di la bstan pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa'am shes pa nyid kyang de las de'i ngo bo yin la gzhan las ni gzhan gyi rnam pa can yin no zhes bya ba 'di la bstan pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The aspect or consciousness itself is that entity from that, and from another, it has another aspect. This is the teaching: ‚ÄúIt is like this.‚Äù

original: 'ga' yis zhes bya ba ni las dang 'byung ba chen po la sogs pa las so //
analyzed: 'ga' yis zhes bya ba ni las dang 'byung ba chen po la sogs pa las so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy some‚Äù means by action, the great elements, etc.

original: dbang po ni shes pa skyed par byed cing de nyid rang gi skyon gyis sre bar byed kyi /
analyzed: dbang po ni shes pa skyed par byed cing de nyid rang gi skyon gyis sre bar byed kyi /
translated: The sense faculty produces the consciousness and that itself is impaired by its own fault.üîΩIs it not the case that the aspect of the object to be produced is not impaired?

original: don gyi bskyed bya'i rnam pa la ma yin pa ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la rnam pa la yang dbang po'i skyon gyi byed pa mthong bar bstan pa ni mar me la sogs zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: don gyi bskyed bya'i rnam pa la ma yin pa ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la rnam pa la yang dbang po'i skyon gyi byed pa mthong bar bstan pa ni mar me la sogs zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The teaching that the fault of the sense faculty is also seen in the aspect is ‚Äúlike a lamp, etc.‚Äù

original: dbang po ni skyon bzhin du de'i rnam pa yang byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbang po ni skyon bzhin du de'i rnam pa yang byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The sense faculty is like a fault, and its aspect is also impaired. This is the meaning.

original: mar me'i rang bzhin de lta bu'i rnam pa can ma yin nam /
analyzed: mar me'i rang bzhin de lta bu'i rnam pa can ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt the aspect of the nature of a lamp like that?

original: ji ltar dbang po nyid de lta bur byed pa yin zhes zer ba la de'i zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar dbang po nyid de lta bur byed pa yin zhes zer ba la de'i zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If you say that the sense faculty is the reason in that way, then the response is ‚ÄúIn that case, . . .‚Äù

original: @185a * // mar me yang rgyu mtshan yin gyi de lta bu'i bdag nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: @185a * // mar me yang rgyu mtshan yin gyi de lta bu'i bdag nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: A lamp is the reason, but it is not of that nature.

original: de lta bu'i bdag nyid ma yin pa yang skyon las 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan yin te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i bdag nyid ma yin pa yang skyon las 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan yin te /
translated: And even if it is not of that nature, it is the reason for the arising of the error.

original: nges pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir la de nyid kyi phyir 'di de nyid yin na gzhan gyis kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir la de nyid kyi phyir 'di de nyid yin na gzhan gyis kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya'i don to //
translated: Because it has a definite object, and for that very reason, if it were that, then others would also see it. This is the meaning of the statement.

original: de lta bu'i rnam pa phyi rol nyid yin yang dbang po'i skyon yod kyang tshad ma ma yin par bstan pa ni yang dag mthong na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rnam pa phyi rol nyid yin yang dbang po'i skyon yod kyang tshad ma ma yin par bstan pa ni yang dag mthong na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even though the external object is of that kind, if the sense faculty is defective, it is not a valid cognition. This is demonstrated by ‚ÄúIf one sees . . .

original: nyams pa nyid ni de nyid ma yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te yod pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyams pa nyid ni de nyid ma yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te yod pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äù If you say that the defect itself is not that, then the response is ‚ÄúIf it exists . . . ‚Äù

original: phyi rol nyid kyi khyad par mthong ba na ma nyams pa yin la de las gzhan pa snang du rung ba dkyil 'khor dang bral ba la rgyas pa tsam yang mthong bar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni rab rib kyis sbyangs zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: phyi rol nyid kyi khyad par mthong ba na ma nyams pa yin la de las gzhan pa snang du rung ba dkyil 'khor dang bral ba la rgyas pa tsam yang mthong bar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni rab rib kyis sbyangs zhes bya ba ste /
translated: When one sees the difference of the external itself, it is not impaired. It is taught that other than that, the mere expansion of what is suitable to appear, which is devoid of the ma·πá·∏çala, will be seen.

original: gzhan gyis mthong ba'i ngo bo 'dzin pa'i nus par sgro btags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyis mthong ba'i ngo bo 'dzin pa'i nus par sgro btags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the capacity to apprehend the nature seen by others is imputed.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni mig go //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni mig go //
translated: ‚Äú That‚Äù refers to the eye.

original: gsal ma yin no mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: gsal ma yin no mi nus pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Not clear‚Äù means not capable.

original: de ltar na gzhan la snang ba mi gsal bar mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na gzhan la snang ba mi gsal bar mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the appearance of others will be seen unclearly.

original: 'on ji ltar nges par bstan pa yin zhes na /
analyzed: 'on ji ltar nges par bstan pa yin zhes na /
translated: But how is it taught?

original: gang zhig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú That‚Äù refers to the eye.

original: gzhan gyi snang ba ma mthong ba'i phyir nus pa nyams pa yin gyi sbyangs pa ste khyad par can du byas pa ma yin par bstan pa ni des na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi snang ba ma mthong ba'i phyir nus pa nyams pa yin gyi sbyangs pa ste khyad par can du byas pa ma yin par bstan pa ni des na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is taught that because the appearance of others is not seen, the capacity is impaired, but it is not purified, that is, made special.

original: yang dag yang dag min ni yang dag pa yin na thams cad yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin na thams cad de lta bu yin te /
analyzed: yang dag yang dag min ni yang dag pa yin na thams cad yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin na thams cad de lta bu yin te /
translated: If it were real, everything would be real, and if it were unreal, everything would be that way.

original: mthong ba nyid don byed pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir te /
analyzed: mthong ba nyid don byed pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir te /
translated: Because seeing itself is the functioning of the object.

original: de nyid kyi phyir phyi rol gyi yang de nyid yin te gzhan du na thug pa med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir phyi rol gyi yang de nyid yin te gzhan du na thug pa med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: For that very reason, the external is also that, otherwise there would be an infinite regress.

original: yang dag pa nyid min te /
analyzed: yang dag pa nyid min te /
translated: It is not real,

original: phyi rol gyi shes pa'i tshogs pa las byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi shes pa'i tshogs pa las byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: because it arises from the collection of external consciousnesses.

original: gang zhig ces bya ba ni shes pa'i ngo bos so //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba ni shes pa'i ngo bos so //
translated: That which is the object of consciousness is the external.

original: gzhan du ni ji lta bur na zhes bya ba ni phyi rol te dbang po nyid ni de'i bskyed bya ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan du ni ji lta bur na zhes bya ba ni phyi rol te dbang po nyid ni de'i bskyed bya ma yin te /
translated: Otherwise, how could it be the external? The sense faculty itself is not its product.

original: rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang / de ma yin pa las log pa'i skad cig gi khyad par yang de'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir nye bar len pa yang rgyun kho na yin gyi skad cig ma nye bar len pa la sogs pa nyid ni 'jig rten pa ma yin te rtogs pa ma yin no
analyzed: rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang / de ma yin pa las log pa'i skad cig gi khyad par yang de'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir nye bar len pa yang rgyun kho na yin gyi skad cig ma nye bar len pa la sogs pa nyid ni 'jig rten pa ma yin te rtogs pa ma yin no
translated: Because it is the cause, and because the difference of moment that is the opposite of that which is not is also the cause of that, the appropriator is only a continuum, but the moment is not the appropriator, etc. for the world, i.e., it is not understood.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: rab rib la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni shes pa'i tshogs pa las 'byung ba nyid do //
analyzed: rab rib la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni shes pa'i tshogs pa las 'byung ba nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúLike a cataract, etc.‚Äù means that it arises from a collection of consciousnesses.

original: gzhan yang dkyil 'khor nyid mthong ba ma yin te gang gis de'i snang du rung ba gzhan @185b yang mthong ngo zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ni snang dbang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang dkyil 'khor nyid mthong ba ma yin te gang gis de'i snang du rung ba gzhan @185b yang mthong ngo zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ni snang dbang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Moreover, the circle is not seen, because it is possible for another to see it, i.e., it is possible for another to see what is suitable for its appearance. This is taught in ‚Äúthe appearance, sense faculty,‚Äù etc.

original: gcig gi ni dkyil 'khor dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: gcig gi ni dkyil 'khor dang bral ba'o //
translated: One‚Äôs circle is free from the circle.

original: rtogs pa ni 'dis so //
analyzed: rtogs pa ni 'dis so //
translated: Realization is by this.

original: des na ni rtogs pa'i nus pas yin gyi gzhan gyi rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: des na ni rtogs pa'i nus pas yin gyi gzhan gyi rgyu ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is by the power of realization, not by another cause.

original: dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i yang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rgyu ma yin te rang rig pa las gzhan du yul ma yin la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i yang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rgyu ma yin te rang rig pa las gzhan du yul ma yin la /
translated: The ma·πá·∏çala that is seen is not the cause of the ma·πá·∏çala, etc., because the object is not other than one‚Äôs own awareness.

original: des na yul yang rang rig pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des na yul yang rang rig pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the object is also one‚Äôs own awareness.

original: gzhan du ni yul gzhan la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: gzhan du ni yul gzhan la sogs pa la'o //
translated: Otherwise, the object is other, etc.

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni rab rib kyis sbyangs zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni rab rib kyis sbyangs zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so //
translated: How? The analogy of the eye disease is appropriate.

original: gang du zhes bya ba ni gzhan du'o //
analyzed: gang du zhes bya ba ni gzhan du'o //
translated: Where? In another place.

original: rang snang ba yin na ni zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor ro //üîΩgzhan yang ni gzhan du yod pa yang ngo //
analyzed: rang snang ba yin na ni zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor ro // gzhan yang ni gzhan du yod pa yang ngo //
translated: If it were self-illuminating, it would be the ma·πá·∏çala.üîΩMoreover, it would exist elsewhere.

original: phan tshun du zhes bya ba ni gzhan du gnas pa ni 'dir gnas pa'i gzhan du'o //
analyzed: phan tshun du zhes bya ba ni gzhan du gnas pa ni 'dir gnas pa'i gzhan du'o //
translated: Mutually, it would exist in another place.

original: myong ba nyid du zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang phyi ma dag las gcig las yang phyi rol mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: myong ba nyid du zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang phyi ma dag las gcig las yang phyi rol mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: As experience, it would not exist externally from the prior and subsequent.

original: des na yang myong ba'i bdag nyid las myong ba'i rgyu rjes su dpog pa yin par bstan pa ni sngon po la sogs pa la yang myong ba gnas par 'gyur ba rnams zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des na yang myong ba'i bdag nyid las myong ba'i rgyu rjes su dpog pa yin par bstan pa ni sngon po la sogs pa la yang myong ba gnas par 'gyur ba rnams zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the statement that the cause of experience is inferred from the nature of experience is called ‚Äúthe presence of experience in blue, etc.‚Äù

original: dkyil 'khor bzhin du gzhan la yang phyi rol rjes su dpag pa ma yin pa ma yin nam 'brel pa ma mthong bar khyad par med par zer ba la dka' ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bzhin du gzhan la yang phyi rol rjes su dpag pa ma yin pa ma yin nam 'brel pa ma mthong bar khyad par med par zer ba la dka' ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Is it not the case that, like a circle, the external is not inferred from another, since it is said that there is no difference in the absence of a seen relation?

original: gzhan gyis ni mi gzhan gyis so //üîΩshes pa gzhan gyis ni skyon las ma byung bas yin gyi dkyil 'khor nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni mi gzhan gyis so // shes pa gzhan gyis ni skyon las ma byung bas yin gyi dkyil 'khor nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúAnother‚Äù means another person.

original: de'i 'bras bu ni phyi rol don gyi 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu ni phyi rol don gyi 'bras bu'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy another cognition‚Äù means that it is not the case that the circle is not the result of a fault, but rather that the result is the result of an external object.

original: de lta na ji ltar rtogs pa yin zhe na de lta bu ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de lta na ji ltar rtogs pa yin zhe na de lta bu ma yin pa'o //
translated: How is it understood in that case? It is not like that.

original: 'jig rten gyi zhes bya ba ni de'i de lta bu'i zhen pa'i tha snyad do //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi zhes bya ba ni de'i de lta bu'i zhen pa'i tha snyad do //
translated: ‚ÄúOf the world‚Äù is the conventional adherence to that.

original: thams cad nyid ni don byed par nus pa'am cig shos kyang ngo //
analyzed: thams cad nyid ni don byed par nus pa'am cig shos kyang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúAll‚Äù means either capable of effective action or the other.
